GK16visa07cu:1: iha hi prathamataḥ kāvye doṣaguṇarītyalaṅkārāṇāmavasthitikramo daśitaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:2: saṃprati ke ta ityapekṣāyāmuddeśakramaprāptānāṃ doṣaṇāṃ svarūpamāha---
GK16visa07cu:5: (vi, ka) iha hi prathamataḥ prathamaparicchede doṣānāmavasthitikramo 'vasthitiprakāro darśita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:11: atra ca rītyalaṅkārāṇāmiti pāṭhastu uddeśavyutkrameṇa lekhakapramādaparamparayaiveti lakṣyate /
GK16visa07cu:14: (lo, a) kāvyasvarūpaṃ nirūpya doṣān nirūpayitukāmaḥ tatprastāvaṃ darśayati /
GK16visa07cu:36: pade tadaṃśe vākyer'the saṃbhavanti rase 'pi yat // VisSd_7.1 //
GK16visa07cu:39: (lo, i) te punariti--te doṣāḥ padatadaṃśādipañcake sthitā yasmāt vākyārthabhūtasyāsvādasyāpakarṣakāraṇāni tasmāt pañca prakārāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:50: aprayuktatā ityatra dvandvottarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratyekamabhisambandhāt duḥ śravatvādaya eva doṣāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:51: etadādyavimṛṣṭavidheyāśabhāvāntāḥ trayodaśa doṣāḥ padavākyayoḥ pade vākye 'pi sambhavanti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:54: nirarthakatvamasamarthatvaṃ cyutasaṃskāratā ceti doṣatrayaṃ paraṃ kevalaṃ pade natu vākye ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:57: (lo, ī) tatra ke doṣāḥ kiniṣṭā ityata āha--duḥ śraveti /
GK16visa07cu:69: etacca vīrabībhatsaraudrān rasān vihāya iti bodhyam,
GK16visa07cu:72: samagrapadavyāpakatve tu pratikūlavarṇatvadoṣa eva ityadi boddhavyam /
GK16visa07cu:90: tatra vrīḍājugupsayoḥ kārakatvaṃ maṅgalasya ca jñāpakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:97: (vi, cha) dṛptārīti---sādhanaṃ senā ca cārthaḥ prākaraṇikatvāt anekārthasya sādhanaśabdasya vācyaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:105: he tanvi / tava vināśe adarśane sati tadā mama duḥ khotpādanāya vāyuḥ śanaiḥ mandaṃ prasasāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:111: (lo, ū) dṛpteti--atra sādhanaśabdo hastyaśvādisādhanārthe prayuktaḥ puṃdhvajasya,
GK16visa07cu:113: vināśaśabdaśca adarśanārthe maraṇasya ca smāraṇāt kameṇa vrīḍādivyañjakāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:120: (vi, jha) dṛpteti--atra sādhanaśabdo hastyaśvādisādhanārthe prayuktaḥ puṃdhvajasya,
GK16visa07cu:122: vināśaśabdaśca adarśanārthe maraṇasya ca smāraṇāt krameṇa vrīḍādivyañjakāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:135: tena idānīntanānekakavibhiḥ prācīnaikakavinā vāsyā'dare 'pi doṣa eva /
GK16visa07cu:136: evañca “padmān hi me prāvṛṣi khañjarīṭān “iti naiṣadhakṛtā prācīnaikakavinā ādare 'pi doṣa eva /
GK16visa07cu:137: kāvyavyatirikte bhāṣāmātre tadādare tu adoṣa eva,
GK16visa07cu:159: yogaśastra eva na tu loke arthaśāstre vā /
GK16visa07cu:165: te ca manasi varttamānāḥ puruṣe apadiśyante iti /
GK16visa07cu:166: kiñcaivaṃ vaktṛboddhavyayoḥ śāstrānabhijñatvabodhādiṃ vinā doṣa iti /
GK16visa07cu:169: “āśaīḥ paramparāṃ vandyāṃ karṇe kṛtvā kṛpāṃ kuru” /
GK16visa07cu:170: atra vandyāmiti kiṃ bandībhūtāyāmuta vandanīyāmiti saṃdehaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:180: (lo, ḷ) vandyāmiti--asya saptamyantatvena dvitīyāntatvena ca sambhavāt prakaraṇābhāvena vinigamanābhāvāt sandehaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:186: aśaktikṛtaṃ kaverasāmarthyamātreṇa kṛtaṃ na tu rūḍhiprayojanayoḥ anyatareṇa kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:195: darśitaṃ hi sthāne sthāne lakṣyārthāteśayaḥ prayojanamiti cet, na /
GK16visa07cu:198: prakṛte nirjitatve lakṣyārthe mukhaniṣṭhaśobhājanyatvameva vivakṣito yogaścaraṇāghāte mukhyārthe cālīke tacchobhābhāvāt tajjanyatvanirjitatvaṃ na pratīyata eva /
GK16visa07cu:199: tataśca tadapratītyā asyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ kaviprayogānarhatvajñānena aśraddheyatvāt lakṣyārthatiśayaḥ prayojanaṃ na pratīyate eva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:212: yamunāyāḥ śambaraṃ jalam ambaram ākāśaṃ vyatānīt vyāptamityarthaḥ “ambu śambum” iti koṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:215: atra tu prasiddhivaśāt liṅgānanusandhāne 'pi padamātreṇaiva prathamataḥ tadupasthityavalambanāt liṅgasyānvayasya ca bodhāttu paścādeva jalapratīteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:224: atreti na ca ghadhātornānārthatvena dāne grahaṇe 'pi śaktirastyeva,
GK16visa07cu:225: āṅupasargeṇa tu dānabodhapratibandha evetyataḥ śakyārthe kathaṃ śaktibhrama iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:227: tadapekṣyā āḍupasargarahitasyaiva dāñaḥ dāne śaktirityasyaiva yuktatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:228: ḍudāñ dāne iti sāmānyataḥ śaktidarśanāttu śaktibhramaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:229: neyārthe tu bhramabījābhāvāt na bhrama iti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:230: ato neyārthatvalakṣaṇe śaktibhramābhāve sati iti viśeṣaṇādānādasāṅkaryam /
GK16visa07cu:231: avācake ca śaktibhramāt vivakṣitārthe tātparyasattvāt tātparyarūpāyā lakṣaṇāyā vivakṣitārthatvabodhakatvamastyeva iti /
GK16visa07cu:236: nirthakādidoṣapatrayasya tu vākyadoṣatvaṃ na sambhavatīti tadapāsyam /
GK16visa07cu:247: (vi, tha) yathā vā--“dinaṃ me tvayi saṃprāpte dhvāntacchannāpi yāminī /
GK16visa07cu:249: dhvāntacchannāpīti apikāreṇa dhvāntacchannatvaviparītabodhanāt prakāśamayatvasyaiva tadviparītabodhāt na tu dinatvasya /
GK16visa07cu:269: atra kṣīrodajā lakṣmīstasyā vasatiḥ padmaṃ tasya janmabhuvo jalāni /
GK16visa07cu:282: atreti---bhavasya patnītyarthe sādhitasya bhavānīśabdasya arthena patiśabdārthasya anvayavaśāt caitrasya bhāryāyāḥ patirityatra iva upapatipratītyānindā /
GK16visa07cu:284: (lo, au) bhavānīśabdo bhavasya patnītyarthe nadādau ānapratyayāntaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:294: sa ca samabhivyāhārapratītisākṣiko na tu gata eva /
GK16visa07cu:295: tathā hi prāṅnirddiṣṭavidheyakaṃ bahuvrīhiṃ vinā samāsāntare vidheyasya pāte,
GK16visa07cu:296: asamāse tu uddeśyāt pūrvavidheyasya pāte tathātvam /
GK16visa07cu:301: tasyedānīṃ vṛthātvamityataḥ ucchūnatve uddeśye vṛthātva vidheyam /
GK16visa07cu:302: taccātra karmadhārayasamāsagatatvenāvimṛṣṭamityarthaḥ bahuvrīhisamāse prāṅnirddiṣṭaṃ vidheyaṃ tu vidheyatayaiva pratīyate /
GK16visa07cu:304: “nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dhara“ityatra rāge nirmṛṣṭatvasya citragurityatra gavicitratvasya ca vidheyasya vidheyatayaiva sārvalaukikī pratītiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:305: na tu karmadhāraye vidheyapāte tadavimarśa iti satyam /
GK16visa07cu:308: “ṣaṣṭhabāṇa iva pañcaśarasya“ityatra bāṇe uddeśye 'nvayi ṣaṣṭhatvaṃ vidheyamavimṛṣṭam /
GK16visa07cu:309: yatra tūddeśyatāvacchedake vidheyamanveti tatra vidheyatayaiva pratīteḥ ānubhāvikatvānna doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:310: yathā“eṣvayamatyanvapaṇḍita“ityatra atyantasya vidheyasya uddeśyatāvacchedake pāṇḍitye evānvayo vidheyatayaiva pratītiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:311: evaṃ“nitāntasundarīkāntā“ityatrāpi saundarye 'nvitasya nitāntatvasya eva---“anirddayopabhogasya rūpasya mṛdunaḥ kathaṃ /
GK16visa07cu:312: kaṭhinaṃ khalu te cetaḥ śirīṣasyeva bandhanam //
GK16visa07cu:314: tathā ca prakṛte 'pi ucchūnatvena uddeśyatāvacchedakenānvitasya vṛthātvasya kathamavimṛṣṭatvam. ucchūnabhuje vṛthātvasya tu kiṃpadenaiva uktatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:315: yattu kāvyaprakāśakṛtā asyaiva ślokasya prathamacaraṇe“nyakkāro hyayameva me yadahayaḥ';
GK16visa07cu:317: atra caraṇe ucchūnatvamātraṃ cānuvādyaṃ natu vṛthātvaviśeṣitam“ityuktam,
GK16visa07cu:321: tathā hi svargaviluṇṭhane ucchūnatvameva janyate natu tad vṛthātvaṃ vṛthātvaviśeṣitamucchūnatvaṃ vā /
GK16visa07cu:323: ato viluṇṭhanasya janakatāsambandhena vṛthocchūnatve 'nanvayādabhavanmatayogadoṣa eva darśitaḥ na cābhavanmatadoṣasya vākyamātragāmitvameva tenoktaṃ kathaṃ,
GK16visa07cu:330: ayamāśayaḥ-- tatpuruṣasamāse uttarapadasyaiva prādhānyāt vṛtheti pūrvapadasya vidheyasya prādhānyenānirddeśādavimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśo doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:332: iha vakturdaśamukhasyāyamāśayaḥ--purā mama bhujānāṃ yad ucchūnatvaṃ sthitaṃ taditānīṃ vṛthābhūtamiti /
GK16visa07cu:333: evaṃ vidheyatvena vivabhitasya vṛthātvasya samāse guṇībhāvādanuvādyatvapratyayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:334: tena ca pūrvato bhujānāmucchūnatvasya vṛthātvābhāvād bhujānāmapakarṣa eva pratīyate na bhujavikṣepaṇotkarṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:344: atra rāmasambandhādevāyamahaṅkāra ityato rāmasambandhabodhikāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tatpuruṣe lopāt rāmasambandhasya vidheyasāvimarśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:350: na khalu tasya kevalasya mukhyatā kintu rāmasambandhina ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:361: (vi, pha) yathā veti---atra samudraparyyantatvasya vidheyasya samāse 'vimarśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:365: (lo, i) ṣaṣṭha iti--atra utprekṣāviṣayatvena vivakṣitasya ṣaṣṭapadasya tatpuruṣasamāse pūrvānikṣepo na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:376: tathā ca mocanābhāvasya evātra vidheyatvāt asamāsenaiva tathātvaṃ bodhayitumucitamityāha---vidheyatvamevocitamiti /
GK16visa07cu:377: samāse tu tadbhannatvasya eva pratītyā paryyudāsatvameva tatra tu vidheyasya pratīṣedho na pratīyate itadyatastasyāvimarśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:385: jugopātmānamatrasta ityādau iva vidheḥ prādhānya yatra nāsti /
GK16visa07cu:386: navajaladhara ityādisamanantaroktodāharaṇavat yatra pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ kiyayā kaṇṭhoktayā adhyāhāryyayā vā astibhavatyādirūpayā paryyudāsatāpātātparyyudāsayogakṣemāpatteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:390: uktodāharaṇo tu tatpuruṣasamāse guṇībhāve nañaḥ paryudāsatayā niṣedhasya vidheyatayānavagamaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:393: (vi, bha) asamāse eva nañarthasya vidheyatvarūpaṃ prādhānyaṃ,
GK16visa07cu:394: pratiyoginastvaprādhānyaṃ tādṛśasthale nañaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhatvam ityatra samvādamāha---aprādhānyamiti /
GK16visa07cu:398: tathātvaṃ kīdṛśaprayogamityatrāha---kriyayeti---na pacatītyādau ākhyātakriyayā saha samāsābhāvāt ;
GK16visa07cu:400: tathā ca asamāse yatra nañ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:401: ata evātra muktakriyayā nañaḥ sāhitye 'pi asamāsābhāvāt na prasajyapratiṣedhatā /
GK16visa07cu:403: amuktetyatra tu samāsāt na tathātvamityāha---uktodāharaṇe tviti /
GK16visa07cu:414: vidheyapratiyogibhūtābhāvasya pratiṣedhe naño 'pradhānatā samāsavaśāt apratīyamānavidheyatārūpāpradhānatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:419: na pacatītyatra uttaratra nañsattvāttu na paryyudāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:420: idamatrāvadheyam---pratiyogipadottaranañsattve samāsāsambhavāt yatrottaretyādinā samāsastha eva paryyudāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:422: na dṛptaniśācara ityatra pūrvapatitasyāpi nañaḥ paryyudāsatvāt yatrottaretyādeḥ pralāpatvāpatteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:423: yadyapyasamāsasthasyāpi ghaṭo netyatra paryyudāsatvam asamāsasthasya kriyānvayinaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhatvamiti tu niyataṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:424: samāse kṛdantakriyānvayino 'pi paryyudāsatvāt asamasteti kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ samāse paryyudāsatvameva /
GK16visa07cu:429: atrātrastatādyanūdyātmagopanādyeva vidheyamiti nañaḥ paryudāsatayā guṇībhāvo yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:432: (vi, ya) ityasya udāharaṇaṃ darśayati--jugopeti--evaṃ ca nañaḥ paryyudāsatve tadarthasya samāse vidheyatvāpratīteḥ ityāha /
GK16visa07cu:433: yukta ityatra vidhayasya nañarthasya avimarśa eveti sādhitam /
GK16visa07cu:440: nanu “aśrāddhabhojī brāhmaṇaḥ” “asūryaṃpaśyā rājadārāḥ” ityādivat “amuktā” ityatrāpi prasajyapratiṣedho bhavatīti ced ?
GK16visa07cu:441: na, atrāpi yadi bhojanādirūpakriyāṃśena nañaḥ sambandhaḥ syāttadaiva tatra prasajyapratiṣedhatvaṃ vaktuṃ śakyama,
GK16visa07cu:442: na ca tathā ; viśeṣyatayā pradhānena taddhojyārthena kartraṃśenaiva nañaḥ sambandhāt /
GK16visa07cu:448: yadi kriyāṃśe nañaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt tadaiva prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ syāt “kiyayā saha yatra naña“iti vacanāt /
GK16visa07cu:449: iha tu śrāddhabojanaśīlādayamanya iti kartraṃśenaiva sambandhāt nañaḥ paryyudāsatvameveti /
GK16visa07cu:459_1: pratītidarśanāt tad dṛṣṭāntena amuktetyatrāpi mocanābhāvarūpasya pratiṣedhasya vidheyasya
GK16visa07cu:462: akṣoddhetyanayorapi yadi bhajanadarśanakriyayornañarthasyānvayaḥ syāt tadaiva tathātvāpādanaṃ sambhavati /
GK16visa07cu:463: tayoranvaya eva tatra netyāha--- na ca tatheti /
GK16visa07cu:465: karttari vihitābhyāṃ kṛtpratyayābhyāmupasthāpitena bhojirūpakartraṃśena ca sahaiva naño nañarthasya sambandhāt ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:468: kṛtpratyayena kartrupasthānāt śrāddhabhojī ityatra bhojanakarttaiva pratīyate ityatra samvādamāha--yadāhuḥ--śrāddhabhojaneti /
GK16visa07cu:469: atra kṛtpratyayādevaṃ darśanakarttāro rājadārā api pratīyante ityapi bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:470: tathā ca tayorapi śrāddhabhojibhinnasūryyadarśakabhinnatvam ityevaṃ paryyudāsa eva pratīyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:471: tathā ca samāsasthatannañ--dṛṣṭāntenāpyamuktā ityatra samāsasthanañaḥ paryyudāsatvameva sidhyatīti manasikṛtya amuktetyatra bhojītyataḥ kiñcinmātraṃ valakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati /
GK16visa07cu:477: iha tu bhāṣyakārādimatamāśritya kiyānvayāṃśāpekṣayā prasajyapratiṣedhārthasvīkāre 'pi amuktetyādau /
GK16visa07cu:480: “amuktā” ityatra tu kriyayaiva saha saṃbandha iti doṣa eva /
GK16visa07cu:487: na pacati na nidrāti ityanvaye kartturupasthāne 'pi nidrāpākakṛtyorevānvayāt atha niyamābhāve 'pi tātparyyavaśāt tatra karttaryyeva nañarthānvaya iti cenna /
GK16visa07cu:489: śrāddhābhojanaśīlānvaye tu śrāddhabhojanaśīlabhinna iti pratītau na kadacit bhojanakṛt api pratīyate ityato granthakṛtānavadhānādeva itthaṃ samādhānaṃ kṛtam /
GK16visa07cu:492: tathā ca śrāddhamātrabhojītyarthalābhe mātrārthavaśāt śrāddhabhojanaśīlalābha iti brūmaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:494: ete ca kliṣṭatvādayaḥ samāsagatā eva padadoṣāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:499: samāsagatā eveti natu asamāse 'pi padadoṣā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:501: anāsattyadhīnakliṣṭatve tu samāsasya evāsambhavāt padagatatvaṃ nāsti /
GK16visa07cu:502: viruddhamatikṛtaḥ padārthantarānvayenaiva duṣṭatvāt avimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśasya cānuvādyavidheyārthakapadadvayaghaṭitatvāt vā samāsaṃ vinā padatvāsambhavāt /
GK16visa07cu:507: (vi, śa) eṣāṃ trayodaśānāṃ padagatatvaṃ darśayitvā vākyagataṃ tu darśayitumārabhate /
GK16visa07cu:512: ataḥ śrutikaṭvādīnāṃ kvacit padāṃśaniṣṭatve 'pi bahuvyāpitvena vākyagatatvaṃ boddhavyam /
GK16visa07cu:549: lakṣitena padena ca padmarāgamaṇirucyate ityarthaḥ na ca pratyayānāṃ kṛtyarthānvitasvārthabodhakatvāt kathamatra tṛtīyayā padmārage karaṇatā bodhyate iti vācyam ,
GK16visa07cu:553: vastutastu vāmāvakrāpadayoḥ paryyāyaikyadarśanasya śaktibhramabījasya sattvāt atra avācakatvameva yuktam /
GK16visa07cu:557: atra dhammillasya śobhāṃ prekṣya kasya mānasaṃ na sajyatīti saṃbandhaḥ kliṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:566: atra cāyameva nyakkāra iti nyakkārasya vidheyatvaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16visa07cu:574: anuvādyamanuktvaiva na vidhayamudīrayet iti niyamāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:575: ata eva vahnimān parvata iti na prayujyate /
GK16visa07cu:576: nanu vidheyapadasya pūrvanipātena doṣe padadoṣatvameva ucitamityata āha---racanā ceti
GK16visa07cu:579: tatra dharmmiṇamuddiśya sādyadharmmovidhīyate ityanusāreṇa prathamamanūdya vidheyo nyakkāraḥ paścānnirddiṣṭumucitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:581: ata eva śabdo 'nitya iti vaktavye 'nityaḥ śabda iti vacanena ca prāptaṃ nigrahasthānamāhuḥ /
GK16visa07cu:582: tathā hi kathamatra vākyadoṣa ityata āha---racaneti /
GK16visa07cu:583: padadvayasya viparītatāyāmeveti padaṃ nirddiśya paścānnyakkāra iti padasya ca paścānnirddeśyasya prathamanirddeśāt /
GK16visa07cu:585: vṛthocchūnairityatrāpi avasthānasattve pūrvamatra padadoṣatvamudāhṛtaṃ tatra nyakkāra ityādyanapekṣā granthagauravabhayāt /
GK16visa07cu:588_1: tacchabdasamānārthatayā pratipādyamānā idametadaḥ śabdā vidheyā eva bhavituṃ yuktāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:592: ya ānandayati asau samāgata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:594: yacchabdasya nirākāṅkṣatvapratipattaye pratipadyamānā idametadadaḥ śabdāḥ ityanena teṣāṃ sarvatra tacchabdābhidhānamiti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:596: vinā doṣāsaṅgaṃ satataparipūrṇākhilakalaḥ kutaḥ prāptaścandro vigalitakalaṅkaḥ sumukhai / te” //
GK16visa07cu:608: “yaḥ sa te nayanānandakaraḥ subhru / sa āgataḥ” /
GK16visa07cu:611: (vi, ga) vidheyārthakasyādaḥ śabdasya uddeśyārthakāt yacchabdāt paranipāte 'pi sānnidhyavaśāt vidheyatvāpratītyā etaddeṣamudāharati---āvandayatīti /
GK16visa07cu:612: atra yaste netre ānandayati asau samāgata iti bodhe yacchabdārthe 'nuvādyo 'daḥ śabdārtho vidheyaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:613: tasyāvimarśaṃ grāhayitum adaḥ śabdasya vidheyataucityaṃ darśayati---yattadoriti /
GK16visa07cu:619: tathā ca tacchabda iva idametadadaḥ śabdā api ākāṅkṣāpūrakatvena vidheyārthakatayauva vidheyā bhavituṃ yuktā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:626: yaḥ sa te iti yaḥ prasiddha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:632: tathā sati teṣāṃ vidheyatvaṃ sphuṭamavagamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:640: nirākāṅkṣatvagamakasyaiva ca vidheyatvāpratītiviṣayatvamityatastato nāvimarśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:655: “yaṃ sarvaśailāḥ parikalpya vatsaṃ merau sthite dogdhari dohadakṣe /
GK16visa07cu:660: ekasyaivopādāne tu nāyaṃ vicāra ityāha---yatra ca yattadoriti /
GK16visa07cu:665: yatpāpamarthāt svaniṣṭaṃ tadātmā jānāti ityarthaḥ--evaṃ yaṃ sarveti /
GK16visa07cu:678: (vi, ca) yattadornityasākāṅśratvena tacchabdamātropādāne yacchabdasyārthatvaṃ prasaṅgāddarśayati---tacchabdasya iti /
GK16visa07cu:682: kriyate tathā vālikāryam api sugrīveṇa karttavyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:689: sa ityanena yaḥ prakṛto rāmacandraḥ sa iti /
GK16visa07cu:690: tatra sa ityanena yaḥ sakalalokaprasiddhaḥ sarvajñātvādiguṇāviśiṣṭaḥ tādātmyāyātmana ekābhāvāpattaye /
GK16visa07cu:691: tāṃ yā tadguṇaviśiṣṭatayā anubhūtetyādiṣu yada ārthatvam /
GK16visa07cu:693: yatra ca yacchabdanikaṭasthitānāmapīdamādiśabdānāṃ bhinnaliṅgavibhaktitvaṃ tatrāpi nirākāṅkṣatvameva /
GK16visa07cu:701: yatra ya ādhārastadadhikāraṇamityatra iva idaṃ pade vidheyasya bhū,
GK16visa07cu:704: yaḥ indurvibhāti tena pathikayoṣito dagdhā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:715: “na me śamayitā ko 'pi mārasyetyuvi / mā śucaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:717: atra yo 'sti, sa te bhārasya śamayiteti budhyate /
GK16visa07cu:722: he urvi / me bhārasya śamayitā ko 'pi na,
GK16visa07cu:727: vyākhyātaṃ ca tacchabdārthāvagamaṃ vināpi yathoktabālakasattvasya yata iti uttaravākyagatatayā kāraṇahetutvāvagamād uttaravākyagatayacchabdasya tacchabdānapekṣaṇāt /
GK16visa07cu:728: kintu--- “ye nāma kecidiha naḥ prathayantyavajñāṃ jānanti te kimapi tān prati naiṣa yatnaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:729: utpatsyate 'sti mama ko 'pi samānadharmā kālo hyayaṃ niravadhirvipulā ca pṛthvī //
GK16visa07cu:730: iti yo bhavabhūterahaṅkāraślokaḥ kāvyaprakāśakṛtā yattadordvayoranupādānodāharaṇaṃ darśitaṃ tadevodāharaṇaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:731: tatra utpatsyamānasya dharmiṇo viśeṣyāniścitatvāt yattadbhyāṃ sāmānyata eva ya utpatsyate taṃ prati yatna ityuktaucityāt /
GK16visa07cu:734: ityatraiko yacchabdaḥ sākāṅkṣa iti na vācyam,
GK16visa07cu:735: tathāhi---yadyadityanena kenacidrūpeṇa sthitaṃ sarvātmakaṃ vastu vivakṣitam /
GK16visa07cu:739: (vi, jha) yacchabdasyottaravākyagatatve eva tacchabdasya nirākāṅkṣatvaṃ darśitam /
GK16visa07cu:741: tathāpi vīpsitayacchabdasthale ekayatpadākāṅkṣaiva ekatatpadena nivarttatām anyad yatpadaṃ tu sākāṅkṣamevasyāt /
GK16visa07cu:742: tathā ca---yad yad virahaduḥ khaṃ me tadityatra ekaṃ yatpadaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃsyāt ityāśaṅkya samādhatte--iti na vācyamiti /
GK16visa07cu:744: yena kenacit ityasyāyamabhiprāyo vīpsayā tāvat samastā vyaktaya upasthāpyante /
GK16visa07cu:745: tā vyaktaya eva tatpadena ca parāmarśa yadi vaktustātparyyaṃ tadā ekatatpadenaiva samastavyaktipāramarśāt yatpadadvayākāṅ kṣāpūraṇāt na tatpade vīpsā /
GK16visa07cu:749: yadi vīpsitayatpadadvayena tadvyaktitvena eva upasthāpayituṃ vakātustātparyyaṃ tadā bhavatyeva tatpade 'pi vīpsā /
GK16visa07cu:750: yathā “yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃ varā sā vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:751: “ityatra “yāṃ yāṃ priyaḥ praikṣata kātarakṣīṃ sā sā hriyā namraṃmukī babhūta /
GK16visa07cu:759: tatra aprayuktasya vākyagatatve yathā--“sa pātu vo duścyavano bhāvukānāṃ paramparām /
GK16visa07cu:764: atra padadoṣānantaraṃ padāṃśadoṣāṇām uddeśyakamaprāptatve yeṣāṃ vākyadoṣāṇāṃ padadoṣasajātīyatvena prathamaṃ kathanaṃ,
GK16visa07cu:765: “nyakkāro hyayameva“ityādeśca padadoṣajātīyatve 'pi avimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśasya viśeṣatvenaitat prastāva evodāharaṇam /
GK16visa07cu:773: (vi, ña) tadgaccha siddhyai kuru devakāryyamityatra iti śrutikaṭuḥ /
GK16visa07cu:783: anirddiṣṭakālakāḥ pratyayāḥ triṣvapi kāleṣu bhavantītyanusāsanāt traikālikakriyāsveva tasya sādhutvāt /
GK16visa07cu:785: kintu lakṣaṇīya eva sā lakṣaṇā na neyārthā /
GK16visa07cu:788: (lo, u) vijeya ityanena vijetuṃ śakya eva pratipādyate natu vijitatvam /
GK16visa07cu:797: atra vacaḥ śabdasya gīḥ śabdavācakatve neyārthātvam /
GK16visa07cu:803: na gīrvacaḥ śabdayordvayorapi vācyavācakatvena vākyabāṇatvarūpayogārthena devārthe kathaṃ śabdalakṣaṇeti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:804: bāṇaśabdapūrvavarttino gīḥ śabdasya parivṛttyakṣamatvāt vacobāṇaśabdena devābodhanāt /
GK16visa07cu:806: śaktisattvādeva naca deve lakṣaṇā kintu gīḥ śabdabodhasya ānubhavikatvāt,
GK16visa07cu:808: na caivaṃ gīḥ śabdo vāṇatvameva pratyetumucitam,
GK16visa07cu:810: lakṣitagīḥ śabdenaikavākyabodhanāt tathā pratītiriti prapañcitamidamasmatkṛtakāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ vastravaidūryacaraṇairiti neyārthodāharaṇe /
GK16visa07cu:818: (vi, ḍa) śareti pāṭha iti---tathā ca gīḥ śara iti na bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:823: tathā ca jalāśaya iti samudratvena rūpaemābodhakam /
GK16visa07cu:829: baḍaveti tenāśvānala iti na bhavati baḍavāgniriti tu bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:831: (lo, ṛ) vacaṛ śabdasyeti---atra vacobāṇaśabdena gīrvāṇo vivakṣitaḥ uttarapadameva parivṛttiṃ na sahata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:836: nirarthakatvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ ca padamātragatatvenaila lakṣye saṃbhavaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:841: tathāvidhadoṣāvahaṃ hi ko nāma mūḍhaḥ punaḥ punarabhidadhyāt /
GK16visa07cu:847: atra hantīti gamanārthe paṭhitamapi na tatra samartham /
GK16visa07cu:851: śaktisattve 'pi jaṅghāpaddhatirityādau pratyayaviśeṣopapadaviśeṣasahakāreṇaiva gatismāraṇasamarthaṃ na svata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:864: kanakaśilānibhaṃ kirātamūrttestrilocanasya vakṣo bhujābhyām ājaghne ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:870: nanvatra “ājadhne” iti padasya svato na duṣṭatā,
GK16visa07cu:871: api tu padāntarāpekṣayaiva ityasya vākyadoṣatā ? maivam /
GK16visa07cu:887: (lo, e) ājaghna ityatra na sakalasya padasya parivṛttyasahanam /
GK16visa07cu:889: tathā hi ājaghāna ityukte hanaprakṛtisadbhāve 'pi doṣasyābhāva ityāśaṅkya āha---yathāheti /
GK16visa07cu:899: svamate tu mādhuryaujaḥ prasādākhyāstraya eva guṇāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:901: ājaghne iti padasya doṣaśva padamātragāmīti darśayati---iha tviti /
GK16visa07cu:902: tasyānvayavāyatirekānuvidhāyitvaṃ tu tadarthakasya ājaghāna ityasya prajahāretyasya ca dānena doṣābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:906_1: padaikadoṣatāprasaktivāraṇāya ātmanepadapūrvavarttihandhātorapi tathātvamāha---yathehetyādi na padadoṣa iti /
GK16visa07cu:911: “bhāti padmaḥ sarovara” ityatroktaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ padmaśabdo 'prayukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:913: ādatte iti avācakapadasya śrutikaṭupadāderapi evaṃ nyāyāt padadoṣatetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:915: tathāhi----yadi uktanyāyāt aprayuktatvādyanekadoṣāṇāmapi padamātradoṣatvamuktaṃ tatkathaṃ smārārttyandhaḥ ityādiṣu teṣāṃ vākyagatatvamudāhṛtam /
GK16visa07cu:918: atha teṣāmekavākyasthānekapadāvalambitvād vākyadoṣatā udāhṛtā iti cet tadā padamātradoṣatāprayojakatayā darśitanyāyakathanasya pramattagītataiva /
GK16visa07cu:930: tena nirarthakatva yathā--- “payasāṃ pravāha iva saurasaindhavaḥ“atra surasindhorityetāvatāpi gatārthatve aṇ pratyayo nirarthakaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:935: nanu “kuñjaṃ hanti kṛśodarī“ityatra han prakṛtereva parivṛttayasahatvādasagarthasya padāṃśaniṣṭatvameva kathaṃ padaniṣṭatvamiti cet /
GK16visa07cu:936: atrocyate asamarthatvasya pṛthak padaniṣṭatvasya prāyeṇādarśanāt prakṛtipratyayau hi svārthabodhakau /
GK16visa07cu:937: ityanādṛtya samuditaṃ padaṃ vācakamiti matamālambya intītyatra padaniṣṭatvamevoktam /
GK16visa07cu:938: ata eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtāpi-- apāsya cyutasaṃskāramasamarthaṃ nirarthakam /
GK16visa07cu:950: (vi, da) idānīṃ darśitasvasvalakṣaṇānusāreṇaiva uktadoṣāṇāṃ parasparabhedasambhave 'pi bhedāntaramāha--iva śabdānāmiti /
GK16visa07cu:957: (lo, o) sarvathā prayogābhāvaḥ ata eva vākyadoṣamadhye 'gaṇanam /
GK16visa07cu:989: pade yo doṣaḥ vākye 'pi tādṛśadoṣasya sattvāt---tatsajātīyatā;
GK16visa07cu:992: (lo, a) samprati vakṣyamāṇānāṃ vākyadoṣāṇāṃ samanantarebhyo bhedadarśikāṃ kārikāmāha--evamiti /
GK16visa07cu:993: padadoṣāṇāṃ sajātīyāḥ śrutikaṭvādaya ubhayatra varttamānatvād vākyamātragāḥ na punaḥ śrutikaṭvādivat padatadaṃśavākyagāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1015: “ovaṭṭai ullaṭṭai saaṇo kahiṃpi moṭṭāai ṇo parihaṭṭai /
GK16visa07cu:1016: hiaeṇa phiṭṭai lajjāi khuṭṭai dihīe sā” //
GK16visa07cu:1017: atra ṭakārāḥ śṛṅgārasaparipanthinaḥ kevalaṃ śaktipradarśanāya nibaddhāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1018: eṣāṃ caikadvitricatuḥ prayoge na tādṛśagrasabhaṅga iti na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1024: muñcati no parihasati hṛdaye enaṃ paśyati,
GK16visa07cu:1032: lajjayā paśyati ca diśi diśi khidyati ca ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1038: ovaṭṭai iti---saṃskṛtacchāyā---“apavarttata udvarttate parivarttate śayane kasminnapi /
GK16visa07cu:1039: ramate no vilulitahṛdaye bhraśyati lajjayā truṭyati dhṛtau sā” //
GK16visa07cu:1044: ata eva tathāvidhānāṃ bahuvāraprayoge padadoṣasajātīyo vākyadoṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1060: āhateti---asya tu bahuśaḥ pāta eva doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1062: (lo, i) evaṃ ḷuptāhataprayogayorapi sakṛdeva prayoge na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1079: viśeṣapratipattyarthamiti---dhanurdharaṇādapyasau na māṃ vārayituṃ śakta ityartho viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1084: kecittvāhuḥ---yatra viśeṣaṇasyāpi kriyāviśeṣaṇatvaṃ sambhavati tatrāpi tatprayogo na ghaṭate /
GK16visa07cu:1092: tadāha---kecittviti---atrāpi na yujyata iti prakāśābhiprāyamabuddhvā likhitaṃ vācprayogastu upapattyantarāsattvād yujyata eva /
GK16visa07cu:1093: kintu viśeṣaṇadānārthaṃ tatprayoga ityuktireva viśeṣaṇasya kriyāviśeṣaṇasambhavoktyā dūṣitā na tu vācamityasya prayogaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1098: tadupapattistu yathā---vacerdvidhā vuyatpattiḥ kaṇṭhatālvādyabhighātaḥ tajjanyaṃ vacanaṃ cārthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1099: tatra vacanārthakatayā prayoge vācamiti na prayujyate /
GK16visa07cu:1100: kaṇṭhatālvādyabhighātārthakatayā prayoge tu tatkarmabhūtasya vācamityasya yujyata eva prayoga iti /
GK16visa07cu:1113: (vi, ra) nyūnapadatvamāha---yadi mayīti---mama indratayā indratvena tadā kimityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1116: nūnaṃ prastutakāvyapratipādakasya cāsaṃmukhīnasya mahātmana eveti dṛṣṭipātena vakturabhiṣṭapūraṇamiti /
GK16visa07cu:1117: tasyānirddeśena yasya kasyacidapi dṛṣṭapātasūcanena tatpratyāyanamantharamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1122: atra visaśabdasya dhṛtaparisphuṭatatprasūnā iti sarvanāmnaiva parāmarśo yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1134: dhṛtavikāśitatkāḥ sainyāḥ senāsamavetajanāḥ visaṃ mṛṇālaṃ jakṣuḥ bubhujire /
GK16visa07cu:1155: idaṃ vṛttamiti dodhakaṃ nāma vṛttaṃ chanda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1160: ayamāśayaḥ--sāmānyato hāsasya śṛṅgārarasapratikūlyābhāve 'pi tathāvidhamānasthale smaraśaraviṣārdditasya nāyakasyoktau pratikūlateti
GK16visa07cu:1166: atra“pramuditasaurabha āgato vasantaḥ” iti pāṭho yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1170: kīdṛśaḥ vikasitasahakārabhārasya hārī manohārī parimola yatra tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1178: “anyāstā guṇaratnarohaṇabhuvo dhanyā mṛdanyaiva sā sambhārāḥ khalu te 'nya eva vidhinā yaireṣa sṛṣṭo yuvā /
GK16visa07cu:1179: śrīmatkāntijuṣāṃ dviṣāṃ karatalāt strīṇāṃ nigtabasthalāt dṛṣṭe yatra patanti mūḍhamanasāmastrāṇi vastrāṇi ca” //
GK16visa07cu:1187: evaṃ yairarthāt yadguṇaratnamṛdviśeṣasahitaiḥ sambhāraireṣa yuvā vidhinā sṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1188: yatra yūni dṛṣṭe sati mūḍhamanasāṃ dviṣāṃ karatalādastrāṇi mūḍhamanasāṃ strīṇāṃ nitambasthalād vastrāṇi ca patanti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1202: “vastrāṇyapi” iti pāṭhe tu dārḍhyamiti na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1228: projjvalataḥ jvalanasya jvālāvat vikaṭā sundarī urusaṭānāṃ chaṭā kāntiryasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1229: śvāsenākṣiptāḥ pātitāḥ kulakṣmābhṛtaḥ kulācalā yena tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1261: (lo, o) marvante--marorante asau urvo iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1275: tṛtīyapāde viśeṣasya kriyānvayena vākyārthasamāptāvapi anākaṅkṣitaviśeṣaṇānvayārthaṃ viśeṣasyāvṛttirūpo 'tra doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1276: atra hi dhvāntanāśanenaiva kṣamātalabhāsanaprāptau tadviśeṣaṇam anākaṅkṣitam /
GK16visa07cu:1277: yatra tu viśeṣaṇe ākāṅkṣā tiṣṭhati tatra nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1279: '; ityatra pramāṇādhikatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ vinā prakṛtaśvāsena stanevapathvajananāt śvāsasya pramāṇādhikatva ākāṅkṣā /
GK16visa07cu:1285: yāmeṇākṣīṃ vinā prāṇā viphalā me kuto 'dya sā” //
GK16visa07cu:1286: atra yacchabdaniddiṣṭanāṃ vākyānāṃ parasparanirapekṣatvāt tadekāntaḥ pātinā eṇākṣīśabdena anyeṣāṃ sambandhaḥ kaverabhimato nopapadyata eva /
GK16visa07cu:1294: yayā eṇākṣyā ityevameṇākṣīviśeṣyako 'nvayaḥ kaverabhipretaḥ sa ca na sambhavati /
GK16visa07cu:1301: tathā ca eṇākṣyāmeva sākāṅkṣatvāt tadviśeṣyaka eva /
GK16visa07cu:1302: yā yayetyānayorarthānvayaḥ kaverabhimataḥ sa ca na sambhavatītyāha---ekāntaḥ pātineti /
GK16visa07cu:1304: ekaṃ yatpadaṃ tadantaḥ pātinā tadarthānvayinā eṇākṣīśabdena eṇākṣīśabdārthena ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1305: anyeṣāṃ yā yayeti yacchabdārthānāṃ dvayorapyatra bahutvāropād bahuvacanam /
GK16visa07cu:1306: na cātra eṇākṣīmitipadasya vibhaktivyatyayena yā yayetyanayoranvaya iti bācyam,
GK16visa07cu:1318: “yāṃ vināmī vṛthā prāṇā eṇākṣī sā kṛto 'dya me” /
GK16visa07cu:1319: iti tacchabdanirdiṣṭavākyāntaḥ pātitve 'pi yacchabdaniddiṣṭavākyaiḥ sambandho ghaṭate /
GK16visa07cu:1322: (vi, gha) yadi tu tacchabdārthasya viśeṣyatayā eṇākṣīśabdaḥ prayujyate tadādoṣa ityāha---yāṃ vinā me vṛthā iti /
GK16visa07cu:1325: na ca tathāpiṃ bhinnavibhaktikayattatpadārthayoḥ kathamabhedānvaya iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:1327: yathā yatra dhūmaḥ sa deśo vāhnimān ityatra tatpadārthānvitasya prathamāntapadārthasya deśasya saptamyantayatpadārthe 'nvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1336: atra yadityasya tadetyanena sambandho na ghaṭate /
GK16visa07cu:1340: (vi, ṅa) atra prathamamapi vyatyayamaṅgīkurvataḥ pratyudāharaṇāntaramāha---īkṣase yaditi /
GK16visa07cu:1345: tathā ca yadi kaṭākṣeṇa īkṣase tadā tena kaṭākṣeṇa manobhavaḥ dhanvī ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1350: atra vyomakāsāraśabdasya samāse guṇībhāvāttadarthasya na sarvaiḥ saṃyogaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1356: atreti---kāsāre rājahaṃsa ityevaṃśamāse tatpuruṣe uttarapadārthasya viśeṣyatvāt kāsāraśabdārthasya viśeṣaṇībhāva eva guṇībhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1358: tathā ca tasya payaḥ pūrādau viśeṣaṇībhāvena anvayāsambhava ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1360: ata eva caitrasya dāsabhāryyā ityatra bhāryyāyaṃ viśeṣaṇasya dāsasya caitraviśeṣyābhāvenānvaye sākāṅkṣataiva /
GK16visa07cu:1365: iha tu pradhānasya kāsārapadārthasya prādhānyenāpratīteḥ sarvo 'pi payaḥ pūrādiśabdārthastadaṅgatayā na pratīyata iti sarvavākyārthavirodhāvabhāsa ityubhayorbhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1370: kintu vidheyasya vidheyatvāpratītyā yadeva vidheyamavimṛṣṭaṃ tadeva duṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1372: uddeśyasambandhitayā vidheyatvāpratītyā uddeśyaghaṭitavākyasyānvayavyatirekād vākyadoṣatvād duṣṭaṃ tu vidheyapadamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1388: atra “bhārgavanindāyāṃ prayuktasya mātṛkaṇṭhacchedanakarttṛtvasya paraśunā sambandho na yuktaḥ” iti prācyāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1392: (vi, ja) vācyārthe vivakṣitasya vyaṅgyārthayogasyāsambhave 'pi kvacidayaṃ doṣa iti kāvyaprakāśakṛnmataṃ dūṣayitumāha---aneneti /
GK16visa07cu:1397: bhārgavasyādhikanindā kartaro adhikaṃ vaidagdhyaṃ dyotayati ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1400: samaya eva karoti bālabalaṃ praṇigadanta itīva śarīriṇām /
GK16visa07cu:1407: (vi, jha) akramateti--avyavadhānena taduttarapātaniyamenaiva tatparāmarśakasya śabdasya tatparāmarśārthamanyottarapātastattvam /
GK16visa07cu:1409: paruṣīkṛtāḥ duḥ śravīkṛtāḥ svarā yeṣāṃ tādṛśa mayūrā yatra kriyāyāṃ tādṛśaṃ yathā syāttathā śaradiṃ haṃsaravā ramaṇīyatām ayuḥ prāptavantaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1410: kīdṛśāḥ ? śarīriṇāṃ balābalaṃ samaya eva karotīti vinigadantaḥ kathayanta iti /
GK16visa07cu:1411: mayūraravāpekṣayā haṃsaravāṇāmapakṛṣṭatve 'pi śaradiṃ haṃsaravāṇāṃ paruṣīkaraṇāt samayena svarāṇāṃ balābalakaraṇāt śarīriṇāmapi balābalalābha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1413: atra ca śarīriṇāmapibalābalam iti anvaye kliṣṭatāpi bodhyā /
GK16visa07cu:1416: evaṃ sati praṇigadanta iti padasyāpi anuvādyavākyapraveśaśaṅketyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1419: kalā ca sā kāntimatī kalāvatastvamasya lokasya ca netrakaumudī” //
GK16visa07cu:1423: (vi, ña) dūyaṃ gataṃ samprati śocanīyatāmiti---tapasyantīṃ pārvatīṃ pratijaṭilaveśasya śivasya svanindāvākyamidam /
GK16visa07cu:1424: candrakalā eva prāk śocanīyā āsīt saṃprati tu tavāpi tathātvād dvayamiti /
GK16visa07cu:1425: nindrāpratipādanārthaṃ kapālavattvakathanaṃ kalāyāḥ prārthanā ca tatsamāgamādanumeyā /
GK16visa07cu:1432: (vi, ṭa) amateti---parārtho 'prakṛtārtho rūpyamāṇasvarūpo 'mataḥ prakṛtarasavirodharasavyañjakatvenānucitaḥ yatra tādṛśaṃ vākyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1433_0: rāmamanmatheti--sā niśācarī rākṣasī tāḍakā eva niśācarī abhisārikā rāmasya eva manmathasya
GK16visa07cu:1433_1: kandarpasyaiva duḥ sahena śareṇa hṛdaye tāḍitā satī durgandhavad rudhiraṇaiva gandhadravyayuktaraktacandanaiva
GK16visa07cu:1433_2: ukṣitā jīviteśasya yamasyaiva jīviteśasya prāṇeśasya upanāyakasya vasatiṃ gatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1434: atreti---dvitīyor'tho rūpyamāṇaḥ manmathābhisārikādirūpaḥ aniṣṭaḥ anucitaḥ prakṛtavībhatsavirodhiśṛṅgāravyañjakatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:1436: (lo, u) jīviteśo yamaḥ prāṇeśaśca prakṛto rasaḥ bībhatsaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1443: (vi, ṭha) vācyasyānabhidhānamiti---vācyam avaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ tasyoccāraṇenādhyāhāreṇa ca anabhidhānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1447: atra tu vyatikramalavamapīti apikārādhyāhareṇāpi na vivakṣitasiddhiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1449: samāse tadā vyatikramalavaṃ padārthantaramapītyevamva bodhodayādato 'troccāraṇenādhyāhāreṇāvaśyaṃ vācyasyānabhidhānam /
GK16visa07cu:1457: atra tu na tathā adhyāhārasambhava ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1468: caraṇe ānataḥ kāntaḥ yasyāstasyāstava tathāpi kopa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1471: yadyapīti nirākāṅkṣam eva sambaddhaṃ bhavati tathāpīti tatra dvitīyavākyagatatve eva upapadyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1475: iha tu ṅasantaṃ padaṃ vihāyāsīti padaniveśanena ityanayorbhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1479: atra vacadhātunā prakrāntaṃ prativacanamapi tenaiva vaktumucitam /
GK16visa07cu:1488: atra vacdhātunā uddeśye prativacane 'pi vacdhātunāpi ākāṅkṣā iti darśayati---pratyavocateti /
GK16visa07cu:1489_1: anekavidhāḥ tatra vidhyatayā nirdeśyasya dharmasyaiva punarvidheyatayā ākāṅkṣitasya pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1490: yathatraiva śloke rāvaṇe vidheyatayā nirdiṣṭasya vacanasya prativacanatvena vidheyatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1491: yathā vā--- udeti savitā tāmrastāmra evāstameti ca /
GK16visa07cu:1493: ityatra ekarūpatākathanād udyatsavitari vidheyatayā nirdiṣṭasya tāmratvasya astasavitaryyapi vidhayatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1494: (2) ekoddeśena vidhyasya vidheyāntare uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśa ityaparā /
GK16visa07cu:1496: ityatra jitendriyatvena vidheyasya vinayakāraṇatvasya śarīrapraviṣṭatayā vidheyasya vinayasya guṇaprakarṣavidhau uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1498: yathā--te himālayamāmantrya punaḥ prekṣya ca śūlinam /
GK16visa07cu:1500: ityatra siddhārthanivedanavidhau uddiṣṭasya tatraiva vidheye uddeśyatayā punaḥ pratinirdeśa ityaparā /
GK16visa07cu:1512: ityatra hi yadi padāntareṇa sa evārthaḥ pratipādyate tadānyor'tha iva pratibhāsamānaḥ pratītiṃ sthagayati /
GK16visa07cu:1517: anyor'tha iveti nāviśiṣṭasyaiva nāmino bodha iti mate tāmraraktaśabdadvarūpaviśeṣaṇabhedād bhedāvabhāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1521: tathā ca sati rasānubhavavighna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1526: atra “asmai” itīdamā prakrāntasya tenaiva tatsamānābhyāmetadaḥ śabdābhyāṃ vā parāmarśo yukto na tacchabdena /
GK16visa07cu:1529: (vi, tha) ekavidhau uddiṣṭasya vidheyāntare 'pyuddeśyatayā pratinirdeśe prakramabhaṅgamudāharati---te himālayamiti /
GK16visa07cu:1535: na caivaṃ tatpadenāpi sarvanāmnā tathaiva parāmarśādadoṣa iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:1536: tattu atra asmaiva iti idam śabdena buddhisthapurovarttitayā mahādevaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1537: tacchabdena viprakṛṣṭaparāmarśitayā tasya parāmarśaḥ kartuṃ na śakyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1541: atra “mitā bhūḥ patyāpāṃ sa ca patirapām” iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1544: (vi, da) dharmibhedabhāsakatvena bhedāvabhāsādekoddeśena vidheyasya vidheyāntaroddeśyarūpeṇa pratinirdeśe 'pi taddoṣamudāharati---udanvaditi /
GK16visa07cu:1545: bhūḥ udanvacchinnā sa cāpāṃ patiḥ yojanaśataṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhatīti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1546: atra bhuvamuddiśya udanvacchinnatve vidheye udanvānapi vidheyaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1547: tasya yojanaśatavyāptividhau uddeśyatayā apāṃpatiśabdena pratinirdeśaḥ kṛta iti doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1557: (vi, dha) evavidheye uddiṣṭasya tatraiva vidheye uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśasya pratyayārthasya kramabhaṅgamudāharati---yaśo 'dhigantumiti /
GK16visa07cu:1560: atra nirusukavidhāvuddiṣṭāyā icchāyāstatraiva nirutsukatvavidhau uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1584: ghora iti---sambandhaiviśeṣe eva śabdaviśeṣāṇāṃ prayoga ityatra kāvyaprakāśakṛduktisamvādamāha--mañjīrādiṣviti /
GK16visa07cu:1594: (vi, pha) asthānastheti---yādṛśasthānasattva eva yatpadasya bodhakatā tadbhinnasthānasthatvaṃ tattvam /
GK16visa07cu:1595: tvamasya lokasya ca ityatra tu uttarapaṭhitaniyatapadasya tathātvamatra tu tanniyamarahitapadasyeti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1596: tīrthe tadīye iti---asya rājño gajaiḥ setubandhāt pratīpagāṃ gaṅgam uttarato tadīye gāṅgīye tīrthe uttaradiśi nabholaṅghanalolapakṣā haṃsā ayatnabālavyajanībabhūvurityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1597: setubandhena jalavṛddhyā prāvṛṭkālabuddhyā uttaradiśi mānasarovaragamanārthaṃ haṃsā uḍḍīnā iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1602: (lo, e) tadīya ityasya pūrvaṃ gaṅgāmityasya pāṭho yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1607: atra saṃśṛṇuta ityataḥ pūrvaṃ nañaḥ sthitirucitā /
GK16visa07cu:1608: atra ca padamātrasyāsthāne niveśe 'pi sarvameva vākyaṃ vivakṣitārthapratyāyane mantharamiti vākyadoṣatā /
GK16visa07cu:1613: yathā---“dvayaṃ gatam-” ityādau tvamityanantaraṃ cakārānupādānādakramatā tathātrāpīti /
GK16visa07cu:1621: hitānna ya iti akramadoṣodāharaṇamiti keṣāñcinmataṃ darśayati--iha ke 'pīti /
GK16visa07cu:1624: vācakameveti padāntare yogaṃ vinā prayogābhāvena pañcapadaṃ tripadamiti yathā na prayogaḥ tathā naño 'pi pratiyogipadayogaṃ vināprayogāt na tatra vācakatā,
GK16visa07cu:1626: ghaṭādipadasya tu svataḥ prayogāt tatra padatvaṃ nirvivādamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1630: tathā ca asthānasthapadatvodāharaṇaṃ tīrthe tadīye ityevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1633: “adyāpi stanaśailadurgaviṣame sīmantinīnāṃ hṛdi sthātuṃ vāñchati māna eṣa dhigati krodhādivālohitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1634: prodyaddūrataraprasāritakaraḥ karṣatyasau tatkṣaṇā tphullatkairavakoṣaniḥ saradaliśreṇīkṛpāṇāṃ śaśī” //
GK16visa07cu:1635: atra kopina uktau samāso na kṛtaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:1641_1: niḥ saratām alīnāṃ śreṇībhūtaṃ kṛpāṇāṃ dūrataraṃ prasāritaḥ karo raśmireva tādṛśo
GK16visa07cu:1641_2: hasto yena tādṛśaḥ san tatkṣaṇāt karṣaṇe 'pi hastasya dūre prasāraṇāt /
GK16visa07cu:1653: atra nabho 'ṅgane candraṃ paśya mānaṃ muñceti yuktam /
GK16visa07cu:1667: ramaṇe iti---atra ramaṇe caraṇaprāntapatite satyadhunā krodho nocita iti vākyasya madhye vadāmi sakhi te tattvamiti vākyamanupraviṣṭam /
GK16visa07cu:1693: “vilokya vitate vyomni vidhuṃ muñca ruṣaṃ priye /
GK16visa07cu:1694: ” atra vitataśabdo mānatyāgaṃ prati na kiñcidupakurute /
GK16visa07cu:1702: pallavākṛtiraktoṣṭhītyatra hyākṛtiśabdasya niṣprayojanatvarūpo bādho 'nvayabodhasamakālameva pratibhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1738: tatra pragapakarṣe udāharati harantīti--iyaṃ lokalocanacandrikāsurūpā tanvī yauryuvabhirvokṣate teṣāṃ yūnāṃ hṛdayaṃ navendukalādayo na harantītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1746: yathāśu jāyate pāto na tathā punarunnatiḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:1752: stabdhasya bhadrābhadrāvivecinaḥ vivaraṃ parasya cchidraṃ tatra icchāmātraṃ natu pravṛttau tadapekṣā stabdhatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:1755: “varṣatyetadaharpatirna tu ghano dhāmasthāmacchaṃ payaḥ satyaṃ sā savituḥ sutā surasaritpūro yathā plāvitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1757: śraddhā na kasya śrutau na pratyeti tathāpi mugdhahariṇī bhāsvanmarīciṣvapaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:1761_0: varṣatīti--kasyāścit kāminyāḥ kāntadūtīḥ prati anyāpadeśena sotkaṇṭhavacanamidam---ahaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1761_1: patiḥ sūryyo dhāmasthaṃ svīyaraśmistham etad dṛśyāmānaṃ payo varṣati natu ghano varṣati
GK16visa07cu:1762: tathā yayā surasarito gaṅgāyāḥ pūraḥ pravāhaḥ plāvitaḥ sā arthāt yamunāsavituḥ sūryyasya satyaṃ sutā /
GK16visa07cu:1763: kathametanniścitam ityatrāha---vyāsasyeti---vṛṣṭiyamunayoḥ sūryyaprabhavatvaṃ na khalu kenacidanāptenoktaṃ,
GK16visa07cu:1767: evaṃrūpāsu kālindyāḥ sūryyakanyātvabodhikāsu ca vyāsoktiṣu ko jano na viśvasiti kasya janasyā vā evamarthikāyāṃ śrutau vede na śraddhā ?
GK16visa07cu:1768: api pu sarva eva viśvasiti sarvasya ca śraddhā;
GK16visa07cu:1769: tathā ca hariṇyā api tatra viśvāsaśraddhaucityameva /
GK16visa07cu:1770: tathāpi mugdhā mūḍhā hariṇī bhāsvanmarīciṣu adhikaraṇeṣu jalaṃ na pratyeti /
GK16visa07cu:1771: dhāmasthamacchaṃ paya ityanena payasaḥ sūryyamarīcivṛttitayā vyāsaśrutibhyāṃ bodhitatvena tathā pratyayocityāt /
GK16visa07cu:1778: atra prakṛṣṭataraḥ prakṛtoyamarthaḥ-sa nāgaraḥ satyavāgiti prāmāṇikamevedam /
GK16visa07cu:1779: tasya dūtīnāṃ bhavatīnāṃ vāci satyapratyayo yujyate /
GK16visa07cu:1786: tathāpi mṛgī bhrāntatatvāttatra jalapratyayaṃ na karoti /
GK16visa07cu:1797: tatra marīciṣvadhikaraṇeṣu yamunājalasya sūryyaprabhavatvapradarśanāt pipāsayā yamunāyāmeva pravarttate tatra na jalāpratyayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1801: prākaraṇikaścātra nāyāyasiddhe 'pyarthe bhrāntānāṃ janānāṃ pratyayābhāva ityevaṃrūpaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1804: “sadā carati khe bhānuḥ sadā vahati mārutaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1805: sadā dhatte bhuvaṃ śeṣaḥ sadā dhīro 'vikatthanaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:1812: tathāpīti---prakārakṛtabhaṅgībhedābhāvādanavīkṛtatvamevetyarthaḥ yathā---“sadā carati khe bhānurnityaṃ vahati mārutaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1815: bhānuḥ sadeti--- ṣaṣṭhāṃśavṛtte rājño 'pi ṣaṣṭhāṃśagrahaṇaṃ prajāpālanarūpo dharma eṣaḥ sadaivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1816: atra sadāsatataśabdayoḥ samānaprakārakatvasamānārthakatve 'pi rātrindivamityatrārthasyaiva sāmyaṃ rātritvadivātva prakārabhedaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1819: atrāsya padasya paryāyāntaraṇopādāne 'pi yadi nānyadvicchittyāntaṃ tadāsya doṣasya sadbhāva iti kathitapadatvādbhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1827: vibhartti śeṣaḥ satataṃ dharitrīṃ ṣaṣṭhāṃśavṛtterapi dharma eṣaḥ //
GK16visa07cu:1829: “gṛhītaṃ yenāsīḥ paribhavabhayānnocitamapi prabhāvādyasyābhūnna khalu tava kaścinna viṣayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1830: parityaktaṃ tena tvamapi sutaśokānna tu bhayā- dvimokṣye śastra /
GK16visa07cu:1837: he śastra / tvaṃ yena mama pitrā brāhmaṇajāternocitamanucitamapi paribhavabhayād drupadanṛpatitaḥ paribhavabhayād gṛhītamāsīḥ,
GK16visa07cu:1838: tathā yasya mama pituḥ prabhāvāt tava khalu na viṣayo na kaścid abhūdindo 'pi tvadviṣaya āsīdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1839: tena mama pitrā sutasya hatatvena śrutasya mama śokāt natu bhayāt parityaktamasi ahamapi yatastvāṃ vimokṣeye,
GK16visa07cu:1844: (lo, i) śastramocana ityatra aśvatthāmna iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1853: atreti pitṛmaraṇānantarameva putrasya śrīlābhaḥ prāyaśa iti bhāvaḥ /

GK16visa07cu:2337: yadi ca aucityābhāva eva tarhi ityucyate tadā samastadoṣāṇāmeva anucitatvenaitasya doṣaviśeṣatvānupapattiriti cetsatyam /
GK16visa07cu:2344: (lo, i) tathā hīti--atra kāvyasya śaśinā na sādṛśyam /
GK16visa07cu:2351: atra rūpakatve 'pi sa eva doṣastasyapi sādṛśyamūlatvād upamānāsambhave---prajvaladiti -- prajvalantyo jaladhārā hmaprasiddhāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2356: ityatra daṇḍiṃ nā kvacitpadena straṣṭurvidheḥ kvacit sarvapadmaprabhāharaṇasambhāvanāṃ pradarśya tādṛśopamānenābhūtopamā darśitā /
GK16visa07cu:2357: ata eva bālapravāvalaviṭapaprabhāva lateva ityatrāpi vaṭādiviṭame latādarśanāt pravālaviṭape latāṃ sambhāvya tadupamā kṛtā /
GK16visa07cu:2358: prakṛte tu jale jvalanasya sarvathā bādhāt prajvalajjaladhārāyāḥ sambhāvanāśakyatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2385: kṣudre 'pi nūnaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapanne mamatvamuccaiḥ śirasāmatīva” //
GK16visa07cu:2390: yo himālayo guhāsu līnamandhakāraṃ divākarād rakṣati /
GK16visa07cu:2393: uccaiḥ śirasāṃ mahimnā uccamaulīnāmarthānmahatām uccaiḥ śikharāṇāṃ ca /
GK16visa07cu:2413: (vi, gha) sahaseti---sā sundarī nāyikā strigdhairālijanaiḥ saha sahasā sasmitā udite rajanīnāthe sahasā tatkṣaṇaṃ kuñjamandiraṃ yātītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2415: (lo, ṛ) ālijanaiḥ saha sārdhaṃ sahasā vegena sahasā hasena saha vartamānā /
GK16visa07cu:2423: “eṣa mūrto yathā dharmaḥ kṣitipo rakṣati kṣitim” /
GK16visa07cu:2428: dharmaḥ puṇyaṃ tasya mūrtyabhāvāttadutprekṣā na tu dharmarūpadevatopamā,
GK16visa07cu:2441: (lo, ḷ) vṛttiḥ niyatavarṇagato yo rasaviṣayo vyāpāraḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2476: atra lakṣmīsthānīyā vidyut hārasthānīyāyā bālākāyā nyūnatvamiti bhaṅgyā pratipādayati---atreti /
GK16visa07cu:2489: yalliṅgena ekadvyādiyadvacanena copameyoktyupakrama upamānasyāpi talliṅgakatvena tadvacanena coktirākāṅkṣitā tathātvānuktau kramabhaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2501: (lo, o) asyāmupamāyāṃ sarvadāpi bhavatītyanena upamānopameyayoḥ kālabhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2510: na khalu āsīt iti sārvadikśobhāsattve atītvena tadvivakṣābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2520: ayaṃ ca svalpa eva doṣaḥ vyatyayena anvayasambhavāt /
GK16visa07cu:2521: ata eva sarvatra kāvye īdṛśa eva prayogaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2523: iha tu yatra liṅgavacanabhede 'pi na sādhāraṇadhaparmasyānyathābhāvastatra na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2528: (lo, au) iha tviti---ayamarthaḥ--yatra liṅgādibhede hi sādhāraṇadharṇo 'bhinnaupamānopameyayordvayorapi sambandhamāpādyate tatra na pratīti sthagayati /
GK16visa07cu:2533: dadhate sma parāṃ śobhāṃ tadīyā vibhramā iva” //
GK16visa07cu:2537: yadi tu nirdiṣṭarūpeṇaivobhayatrānvayasambhavastadā na doṣa ityāha---atra ca liṅgavacaneti /
GK16visa07cu:2539: atrābhātisādhāraṇadharma ubhayatraikarūpa eva liṅgadvayaṃ tu bhinnam /
GK16visa07cu:2541: madhuratayā ramyatayā bhṛtaḥ pūrṇastasyāveśaḥ parāṃ śobhāṃ dadhate dhatta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2545: tadīyā vibhramā iva--te 'pi hi parāṃ śobhāṃ dadhate /
GK16visa07cu:2574: savilāsaṃ gacchantīṃ veśyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śāntasya puruṣasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa07cu:2577: akāraṇam arthāt puṃsāṃ raṇaraṇakaṃ kāmacintāṃ kurute janayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2579: anaṇu analpaṃ raṇantī maṇiyuktā mekhalā yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2580: avirataṃśiñjanaṃ mañju mañjīraṃ nūpuraṃ yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2586_0: evaṃ samāsoktau sādhāraṇaviśeṣaṇavaśātparārthasya pratītāvapi punastasya śabdenopādānasyāprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ
GK16visa07cu:2586_1: vyañjanayaiva prastutārthāvagateḥ śabdena tadabhidhānasya ca punaruktatvam /
GK16visa07cu:2601: aparadik pāścimadigena gaṇikā veśyā viyadrūpādālayād āśrayāt raviṃ nirakāsayat niṣkāsayāmāsa /
GK16visa07cu:2604: anu divasasya paścād rāgavantaṃ raktimāvantamapi ata eva locanayoḥ sukhaṃ sukhajanakam atāpakaṃ ca vapurdadhatamapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2605: atra śliṣṭaviroṣaṇavaśādanurāgavato locanasukhajanakasuśītalavapuṣmato nāyakasya vasunā dhanena rahitatvāt svagṛharūpādālayāt veśyayā niṣkāsanaṃ vyañjanayā pratīyate /
GK16visa07cu:2610: (lo, i) anugato rāgaḥ śoṇimā, premā ca /
GK16visa07cu:2616: “āhūteṣu vihaṅgameṣu maśako nāyān puro vāryate madhye vā dhuri vā vasaṃstṛṇamaṇirdhatte maṇīnāṃ dhuram /
GK16visa07cu:2617: khadyoto 'pi na kampate pracalituṃ madhye 'pi tejasvināṃ dhiksāmānyamacetasaṃ prabhumivānāmṛṣṭatattvāntaram” //
GK16visa07cu:2621: anāmṛṣṭaṃ tattvāntaraṃ yena mahīyasāmalpīyasāṃ ca padārthānāṃ bhedo na prakāśyate /
GK16visa07cu:2622: sāmānyaṃ jātiḥ sāmānyasya sarvāsu vibhaktiṣu ekarūpeṇaivāvasthiterityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2623: anucitaṃ ca vyañjanayaiva pratyuta camatkārātiśayadāyitvena gatārthatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2630: anāmṛṣṭam aparibhāvitaṃ tattvaṃ yena tādṛśamantaraṃ mano yasya tādṛśaṃ prabhumiva /
GK16visa07cu:2631: sāmānyasya acetanatvaṃ darśayati---āhūteṣu vihaṅgameṣu vihāyasā gacchatsu janeṣu praṇiṣu āhateṣu vihāyogāmitvāt pura āyān āgacchan maśako 'pi na vāryate,
GK16visa07cu:2633: gamanamevātra vidheyaṃ bodhyaṃ tadeva sāmānye cetanatvapratipādanasambhavāt /
GK16visa07cu:2634: tathā tṛṇamaṇistu tṛṇākarṣako 'lpamūlyo maṇiḥ dhuri vā madhye vā vasan rathaśobhākārakamahāmūlyamaṇīnāṃ dhuraṃ rathaśobhākaraṇarūpaṃ dhuraṃ bhāraṃ vidhatte /
GK16visa07cu:2638: madhye vasan ityatra madhyevāridhi vā vasan iti kvacit pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2639: tadā ca madhye vāridheḥ madhye vā vasan punaḥ punarvasannityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2640: maṇīnāṃ vāridhvāsasādharmyānmahāmūlyamaṇīnāṃ dhuraṃ maṇitvena gaṇyatvarūpāṃ dhuraṃ bhāram ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2646: teṣām abhidhānavaśādeva acecasaḥ prabhoḥ vyañjanayā lābhe tadabhidhānaṃ punaruktamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2656: asya bhūbhujaḥ cakrādhiṣṭhitatāṃ rājamaṇḍalākramaṇaṃ cakrī viṣṇuḥ prayacchat dattavān /
GK16visa07cu:2659: atraiṣṭakarmasu eṣāṃ karttṛtvaprasiddhirnāsti kintu anuprāsārthameva tathoktam /
GK16visa07cu:2662: cakaprabhṛtīnāṃ ca cakradhiṣṭitatādimātreṇa praśaṃsanaṃ na khalu prasiddham /
GK16visa07cu:2671: raudrādau tu rase 'tyantaṃ duḥ śravatvaṃ guṇo bhavet // VisSd_7.16 //
GK16visa07cu:2674: (lo, ū) adhunā padaniṣṭatvena pañcadhā vibhaktānāmeṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ kvacit keṣāṃcidanyathātvamityāha /
GK16visa07cu:2680: eṣu cāsvādasvarūpaviṣātmakatayā mukhyaguṇaprakarṣopakāritvādguṇa iti vyapadeśo bhāktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2683: (vi, pa) vaktarīti---samuddhate pracaṇḍe bhīṣaṇe iti yāvat /
GK16visa07cu:2685: nanu mādhuryādaya eva guṇāstatkathaṃ duḥ śravatvāderguṇatvam ityatrāha---eṣu ceti /
GK16visa07cu:2687: teṣāṃ prakarṣarūpo ya upacāraḥ tatkāritvād aupacāriko guṇavyapadeśo yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2693: “tadvicchedakṛśasya kaṇṭhaluṭhitaprāṇasya me nirdayaṃ krūraḥ pañcaśaraḥ śararatiśitairbhindanmano nirbharam /
GK16visa07cu:2698: (vi, pha) atra krodhasaṃyukte vaktari duḥ śravatvaguṇamāha---tadvicchedeti /
GK16visa07cu:2699: tasyā vicchedena kṛśasya kaṇṭhalulitaprāṇasya ca me manaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:2703: bhūte prārthini mayi kṛpayā evaṃ kariṣyati /
GK16visa07cu:2705: vicchedakaṇṭhaluṭhitādau chakāraṭhakārādayo varṇā duḥ śravāḥ kupatavaktṛkā guṇāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2708: ūrdhvanyastāṅighradaṇḍabhramibhararabhasodyannabhasvatpravega- bhrāntabrahmaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ pravitaratu śivaṃ śāmbhavaṃ tāṇḍavaṃ vaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:2718: śāmbhavaṃ tāṇḍavaṃ nṛtyaṃ vo yuṣmākaṃ śubhaṃ pravitaratu /
GK16visa07cu:2720_0: mūrddhavyādhūyamānāyā dhvanantyā amaradhunyā gaṅgāyā lolena kallolajālena taraṅgasamūhena
GK16visa07cu:2720_1: uddhūtānāṃ kṣiptānām ambhaḥ kṣodānāṃ jalakaṇānāṃ dambhāt chalāt prasabhaṃ sahasā
GK16visa07cu:2722: ūrddhvanyastayoraṅghridaṇḍayorbhramibhareṇa bhramyādhikyena rabhasodyataḥ sahasodracchataḥ nabhasvataḥ vayoḥ pravegeṇa bhrāntaṃ brahmaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2724: uddhataṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ utkṛtya ityādau bībhatso rasaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2727: raudre duḥ śravatvaṃ yathā mama tātapādānāṃ--- sphuṭavikaṭacapeṭāghātanenāyamaṣṭau sapadi kulagirīn vā khaṇḍaśaścūrṇayitvā /
GK16visa07cu:2736: “tāmbūladānavidhinā visṛjedvayasyāṃ vdyarthaiḥpadaiḥ piśunayecca rahasyavastu” iti kāmaśāstrasthitiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2743: tathāhi puṃso dhvajaḥ patākā sādhanasya sainyasyāntarmadhye praviśyopasarpan gacchan virājate /
GK16visa07cu:2748: tathāhi sambādhe saṃkucite sādhanasya yonerantaḥ praviśya upasarpan gatāgataṃ kurvan puṃso dhvajaḥ liṅgaṃ virājate /
GK16visa07cu:2761: yathā--- nirvāṇavairadahanāḥ praśamādarīṇāṃ nandantu pāṇḍutanayāḥ saha mādhavena /
GK16visa07cu:2762: raktaprasādhitabhuvaḥ kṣatavigrahāśca svasthā bhavantu kururājasutāḥ sabhṛtyāḥ //
GK16visa07cu:2769: dhvajaśca sādhanam aśvādi strīvarāṅgaṃ ca piśunayet sūcayet śamakathāyāmaślīlo yathā--- “lattānocchūnamaṇḍūkapāṭitodarasannibhe /
GK16visa07cu:2774: yathā---“parvatabhedi pavitraṃ jaitraṃ narakasya bahumataṃ gahanam /
GK16visa07cu:2781: tatra nihatārthāprayuktatvayordvayoradoṣatve śleṣe ekamudāharaṇamāha---parvatabheda pavitram iti /
GK16visa07cu:2782: patat pravahat surasarito gaṅgāyā ambho namat /
GK16visa07cu:2786: so 'pi hi parvatabhodinā pavinā vajreṇa trāyate arthāt devān /
GK16visa07cu:2787: ambhaḥ kīdṛśaṃ naraṃkasya pāpajanyayātanāyā jaitraṃ nāśakamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2788: atra hariṃ śrīkṛṣṇarūpaṃ viṣṇumiveti dṛṣṭāntaḥ so 'pi narakasya narakāsurasya jaitraḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2789: ambhaḥ kīdṛśam---bahumataṃ bahujanasammataṃ gahanaṃ nibiḍaṃ ca pravāhātiśayād atra hariṃ siṃhamiveti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2792: na cātra harimevetyatrānavīkṛtatvaṃ kathitapadatvaṃ vā doṣa iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:2795: (lo, e) parvateti--gaṅgājalapakṣe parvataṃ bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya /
GK16visa07cu:2797: indrapakṣe parvatabhodinā pavinā vajreṇa trāyata iti /
GK16visa07cu:2810_1: pravarttikāṃ prakṛtimāmananti vadanti sattvarajastamasāṃ samyāvasthā prakṛtiḥ tata
GK16visa07cu:2812: tathā ca tvāmeva puruṣaṃ sarvakarttṛpuruṣaṃ viduḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2813: tatra kiṃ pramāṇamityata āha---taddarśinamiti---tata eva darśanaṃ jñānaṃ yasya tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2825: yaduktam--- prakṛteḥ kiyamāṇāni guṇaiḥ karmāṇi sarvaśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2832: yathā---“yuktaḥ kalābhistamasāṃ vivṛddhyai kṣīṇaśca tābhiḥ kṣataye ya eṣām /
GK16visa07cu:2836: (vi, ra) svayaṃ vāpi parāmarśe iti kārikāpādastatrāpratītatvaṃ guṇa iti pūrvoktamanusañjayati---apratītatvamiti /
GK16visa07cu:2837: yuktaḥ kalābhiriti--taṃ paramātmasvarūpaṃ candraṃ pariśīlayāmi satataṃ bhāvayāmi ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2840: kālābhaiḥ śarīraparigrahecchārūpābhiḥ kalābhiḥ dharmaiḥ viśiṣṭaḥ san yastamasāṃ śarīrātmanorabhedābodharūpāṇāṃ mohānāṃ vivṛddhyai bhavati yathā rāmaśarīraparigrahe /
GK16visa07cu:2841: anyacandrastu svīyaṣoḍaśāṃśarūpābhiḥ kalābhiryuktaḥ san tamasāmandhakāraṇāṃ kṣataye eva bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:2842: tathā tābhiḥ kalābhaiḥ hīnaḥ sanneṣāṃ tamasāṃ kṣataye bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:2844: anyacandrastu kalāhīnaḥ san tamovivṛddhye eva bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:2845: tamonāśakakalābhāvena tasya tamo vṛddhīṃ prati yatsattve 'grimakṣaṇe yasya sattvaṃ yadasattve 'grimakṣaṇe yadasattvaṃ tattasya kāraṇamityevaṃrūpakāraṇatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2849: atra kalātamaḥ padārthau apratītāvapi svayaṃ parāmarśe guṇau parāpratīteruddeśyatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2875: udayasavituruddeśe vihitasya tāmratvasya astamayasavituruddeśenāpi vidheyatayā pratinirdeśarūpo 'nuvāda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2911: dvyarthatvena tadyogyatā--viśeṣyadvayer'thadvayāttu niścaya eva tathā padārthamāha---guṇa eveti /
GK16visa07cu:2915: tvatto dhanalābhe tupaścāt samaṃ na bhaviṣyati iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2916: pṛthūni kārttasvarasya suvarṇasya pātrāṇi yatra rājasadanaṃ tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2917: pṛthukānāṃ śiśūnām ārttasvarasya pātraṃ daridrasadanaṃ bhakṣyābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2918: bhūṣitāḥ suvarṇadimāṇḍitāḥ niḥ śeṣaparijanāḥ yatra rājasadanaṃ tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2919: bhuvi uṣitāḥ suptāḥ niḥ śeṣaparijanā yatra daridrasadanaṃ tādṛśaṃ śayyāvirahāt /
GK16visa07cu:2921: vilasatkā bile tiṣṭhanto mūṣikapipīllikādayasteṣāṃ reṇubhiḥ gahanaṃ daridrasadanam /
GK16visa07cu:2926: (lo, au) pṛthviti---pṛthukānāṃ balānām ārttasvarasya pātraṃ sthānam /
GK16visa07cu:2929: vilasantaḥ tiṣṭhanta eva vilasatkā reṇavo dhūlayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2945: dīdhīvevīṅ iti kaścijjano guṇavṛddhyorabhājanaṃ guṇavṛddhyā ca hīna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2946: dīdhīvevīṅ dhātvoriḍāgamasya ca samastayorapi guṇasya tadvādhikāyā vṛddheścābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2948: yatra jane sannihite sati tatsannihitasyāpi na te guṇavṛddhī,
GK16visa07cu:2957: kvippratyayanibhaḥ kvipaḥ sarvāpahārīti lopād ripoḥ sarvanāśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2958: atra na kevalaṃ duḥ śravatvaṃ kaṣṭatvaṃ ca /
GK16visa07cu:2970: atra loke tvāmahaṃ kadācana na atārpsam /
GK16visa07cu:2972: asya vaiyākaraṇasya vaktṛtve kaṣṭatvaṃ duḥ śravatvamapi guṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2979: ede assasamohā paḍanti āsāsu duddhadhāra vva” //
GK16visa07cu:2987: ete cāsya mayūkhāḥ patīnti āśāsu dugdhadhārā iva //
GK16visa07cu:2989: (vi, ka) hyo godohodbhavaṃ ghṛtaṃ haiyaṅgavīna bhakṣyalampaṭasyoktau bhakṣyadravyadṛṣṭānto 'tra gramyo guṇaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2992: eso iti--- “eṣaḥ śaśadharabimbo dṛśyate haiyaṅgavīnapiṇḍa iva /
GK16visa07cu:2993: ete cāsya mayūkhāḥ patantyāśāsu dugdhadhārā iva” //
GK16visa07cu:2995: nirhetutā tu khyāter'the doṣatāṃ naiva gacchati /
GK16visa07cu:2997: kavīnāṃ samaye khyāte guṇaḥ khyātaviruddhatā // VisSd_7.22 //
GK16visa07cu:3000: yaśasi dhavalatā varṇyate hāsakīrtyoḥ raktau ca krodharāgau;
GK16visa07cu:3002: toyādhāre 'khile 'pi prasarati ca marālādikaḥ pakṣisaṅgho jyotsnā peyā cakorairjaladharasamaye mānasaṃ yānti haṃsāḥ // VisSd_7.23 //
GK16visa07cu:3005: (vi, kha) sampratīti---sandhyāsamayasya cakravākadvandvavighaṭakatve teṣāṃ khyātisattvānnātra hetvākāṅkṣā /
GK16visa07cu:3012: pādāghātādaśokaṃ vikasati bakulaṃ yoṣitāmāsyamadyair- yūnāmaṅgeṣu hārāḥ,
GK16visa07cu:3014: maurvīrolambamālā dhanuratha viśikhāḥ kausumāḥ puṣpaketo- rbhinnaṃ syādasya bāṇairyuvajanahṛdayaṃ strīkaṭākṣeṇa tadvat // VisSd_7.24 //
GK16visa07cu:3019: (lo, i) hāro hṛdayaṃ ca sphuṭatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3025: candrikā śuklapakṣe meghadhvāneṣu nṛtyaṃ bhavati ca śikhināṃ nāpyaśoke phalaṃ syāt /
GK16visa07cu:3027: na ca kusumaphale gandhasāradrumāṇā- mityādyunneyamanyatkavisamayagataṃ satkavīnāṃ prabandhe // VisSd_7.25 //
GK16visa07cu:3032: atra jyāśabdenāpi gatārthatve dhanuḥ śabdena jyāyā dhanuṣyāyattīkaraṇaṃ bodhyate /
GK16visa07cu:3048: tadvodhaśca dhanuḥ śabdādau dhanurārūḍhatvaṃ lakṣaṇayā rūḍhihetukayā luptaṣaṣṭyartho vā ārūḍhatvam /
GK16visa07cu:3049: gatārthatvepīti--na ca jyāśabdārthaḥ kathaṃ dhanurjyātvasya saṃsthānaviśeṣavyaṅgyajātiviśeṣa iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:3050: jyātvasya jātitve 'pi tatsambandhino dhanuṣo namayataḥ smārakatvena tadvaśādeva dhanurlābhe,
GK16visa07cu:3052_1: na caivaṃ karṇasthaitalakṣaṇāyāmapi karṇasthitakarṇabhūṣā iti bodhanenaiva punaruktiriti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:3054: evaṃ śravaṇeti--etaddvaye padādhikyasyaiva prasāktiḥ kuṇḍalatvakirīṭatvayoḥ saṃsthānavyaṅgyajātitvādeva /
GK16visa07cu:3056: evaṃ nirupapado mālāśabdaḥ puṣpastrajamevābhidhatta iti sthitāvapi “puṣpamālāvibhāti te” /
GK16visa07cu:3063: utkṛṣṭapuṣpaprasiddhyai iti puṣpāṃśo mālāśabdārtha eva puṣpaśabdasya tu utkṛṣṭe lakṣaṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3066: muktāṃśo 'pi hāraśabdārtha eva ityato 'trāpi punaruktereva prasiktiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3074: (vi, ca) satkāvyasthitā eveti---yataḥ satkāvye sthitā ato nibaddhavyā evetyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3082: māti māmalamiti kṣāmākṣarollāpinī suptā kiṃ nu mṛtā nu kiṃ manasi me līnā vilīnā nu kim” //
GK16visa07cu:3087: gāṭhāliṅganena vāmanīkṛtakucā cāsau prodbhinnaromodramā ceti samāsaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3089: sāndrasneharasātirekeṇa vigalat śrīmato nitambādambaraṃ yasyāstādṛśaviśeṣaṇadvayavatī sā mama nāyikā pīḍayetyanuktivaśāt, he mānada /
GK16visa07cu:3090: māṃ mā mā mā ityalimityevamalakṣarollāpinī satī suptetyādivitarkacatuṣṭayaviṣayo 'bhūdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3092: manogatatvena manasi layavitarkaḥ manasoradyāpi abahirbhāvāt atyantalayarūpasya vilayasya vitarkaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3095: kim ? uktarūpā priyā mama manasi suptā nu /
GK16visa07cu:3097: suptāpi punarutthāya pātītyāśaṅkyāha mṛtā nu kim ?
GK16visa07cu:3100: tathābhūtāpi kenacid vyāvarttayituṃ śakyetetyata āhavilīneti--dugdhre jalavat sarvathā bhedopalambhābhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3103: etatpratipādikāyā nāyikāyāḥ sāndrānandajaḍībhūtatayā saṅkīrṇavākyoccāraṇe 'pyasāmarthyaṃ vyanaktīti nyūnapadatvaṃ guṇaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3109: “tiṣṭhetkopavaśātprabhāvapihitā dīrghaṃ na sā kupyati svargāyotpatitā bhavenmayi punarbhāvārdramasyā manaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3110: tāṃ hartuṃ vibudhadviṣo 'pi na ca me śaktāḥ purovartinīṃ sā cātyantamagocaraṃ nayanayorjāteti ko 'yaṃ vidhiḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:3114: sā urvaśī svaprabhāvena pihitā adṛśyā tiṣṭhaditi vitarkyāha--dīrghaṃ na sā iti evaṃ svargāya iti vitarkyāha---mayi punariti /
GK16visa07cu:3115: asyā asureṇa haraṇakoṭistu asambhavyā ityāha---tāṃ hartumiti /
GK16visa07cu:3117: ato 'darśane hetvabhāvāna vismayādāha---sā ceti---agocaram agocaratvaṃ yātā prāptā /
GK16visa07cu:3119: atra prabhāvapihitetiṃ bhavediti cetyanantaraṃ “naitadyataḥ” iti padāni nyūnāni /
GK16visa07cu:3121: “dīrghaṃ na se” tyādivākyajanyayā ca pratipattyā tiṣṭhedityādivākyapratipatterbodhaḥ sphuṭamevāvabhāsata iti na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3124: (vi, jha) atreti---pūrvoktasya niṣedhaṃ pratyeva dīrghaṃ na sā ityanayoḥ hetutvāt natu pūrvapratītiṃ prati iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3126: doṣatvaṃ tu syādityata āha--dīrghaṃ na setyādīti /
GK16visa07cu:3128: tathā ca “naitadyataḥ“ityasyākāṅkṣāvaśādadhyāhāro 'pi na doṣāya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3139: tanna na jāne jāne spṛśati manaḥ kiṃ tu naiva niṣṭhuratām” //
GK16visa07cu:3148: (vi, ña) guṇaḥ kvāpīti---yatrādhikapadasya rūḍhilakṣaṇayā arthāntaraṃ tatretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3149: ācāratīti---manaso 'pyagocarānarthāt asadarthān sahasā yat durjana ācarati tadahaṃ na na jāne /
GK16visa07cu:3151: kintu mama bhanaḥ niṣṭhuratāṃ naiva spṛśati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3155: samāptapunarā ttatvaṃ na doṣo na guṇaḥ kvacit /
GK16visa07cu:3158: evaṃ ca viśeṣaṇamātrasya punarupādāne samāptapunarāttatvaṃ na vākyāntarasyeti vijñeyam /
GK16visa07cu:3161: (vi, ṭa) anyastā ityatra pūrvārddhena vākyasamāptāvapi kathamatra niṣpādakaguṇaratnādīnāṃ vailakṣaṇyamityākāṅkṣotthānādadoṣatā /
GK16visa07cu:3164: viśeṣaṇe ākāṅkṣāsattve tu na doṣa iti prāgeva darśitam /
GK16visa07cu:3166: na vākyatvaviśeṣaṇatvayoriti sthitena vākyāntarasyeti yaduktaṃ tadvākyāntare ākāṅkṣā avaśyaṃ tiṣṭhatītyabhiprāyeṇaiva /
GK16visa07cu:3175: “diṅmātaṅgaghaṭāvibhaktacaturāghāṭā mahī sādhyate siddhā sāpi vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñjitāḥ paśyata /
GK16visa07cu:3176: viprāya pratipādyate kimaparaṃ rāmāya tasmai namo yasmātprādurabhūtkathādbhutamidaṃ yatraiva cāstaṃ matam” //
GK16visa07cu:3177: atra vadanta evetyādi vākyaṃ vākyāntarapraveśāt camatkārātiśayaṃ puṣṇāti /
GK16visa07cu:3182: tathā ca diṅmātaṅgaghaṭābhirvibhaktāścatvāraḥ paryantāḥ yasyāḥ tādṛśī mahī yena rāmeṇa sādhyate /
GK16visa07cu:3183: siddhā vyāghātaśūnyasādhanena svavaśīkṛtā sāpi mahī viprāya pratipādyate /
GK16visa07cu:3185: tasmai rāmāya nama idaṃ kāthādbhutaṃ yasmāt prādurabhūt anyairatathākāraṇāt yasmādeva prādurabhūdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3187: kenāpyutrakālaṃ tathākaraṇādastaṃ gatamityevaṃ vadanta eva vayaṃ romāñcitā eva idaṃ paśyatetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3202: bhīma ityatra sukumāratayā varṇānāmasamāsena ca sukumāratayetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3218: (vi, ṇa) vibhāvānubhāvakṛteti---vyabhicāribhāvasya yau vibhāvānubhāvau tābhyāṃ vyaṅgyatvarūpāyā vyabhicāribhāvasya puṣṭistadrāhityamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3222: “autsukyena kṛtasvarā sahabhuvā vyāvartamānā hriyā taistairbandhuvadhūjanasya vacanairnotābhimukhyaṃ punaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3223: dṛṣṭvāgre varamāttasādhvasarasā gaurī nave sahgame saṃhohatpulakā hareṇa hasatā śliṣṭā śivāyāstu vaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:3227: gaurī nave saṃgame prathamadine harasānnidhyanimittamautsukyena kṛtatvārānantaraṃ ca sahabhuvā sāhajikayā hriyā vyāvarttamānā tataśca taistairityādi /
GK16visa07cu:3228: tataśca varaṃ svāminaṃ haram agre dṛṣṭvā āttasādhvasarūparasā,
GK16visa07cu:3229: tataśca hasatā hareṇaśliṣṭā satī saṃrohatpulakā īdṛśī vaḥ śivāyāstu /
GK16visa07cu:3235_1: yathā lajjādipratipādranaṃ tathā sahasā prasāraṇarūpānubhāvamukhena autsukyasya pratipādane
GK16visa07cu:3237: atrautsukyasya tvarārūpānubhāvamukhena pratipādane saṅgame na jhaṭiti pratītiḥ,
GK16visa07cu:3246: evaṃ hriyo 'pyanubhāvavyāvarttanāt na jhaṭiti tatpratītiḥ ityataḥ tasyāpi hriyeti śabdasya vācyatvaṃ na doṣa ityāha---hriyo 'nubhāvasya ceti /
GK16visa07cu:3248: sādhvasaṃ bhayaṃ hāsaśca hāsyahetuścetovikāsaḥ sthāyibhāvalakṣaṇe darśitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3249: taddvayaṃ ca bhayānakahāsyarasayoḥ sthāyibhāvāvapi gauramaheśayoḥ śṛṅgare 'tra vyabhicārabhāvau /
GK16visa07cu:3253_0: maheśahāsaścoddīpanavibhāvastataśca sādhvasahāsāvanupādāya yadi sakampā iti kriyeta
GK16visa07cu:3253_1: tadā tadaṅgasarpadarśanāt bhayena ārdragajacarmakapāladarśanāt jugupsayā ca śṛṅgārapratikūlābhyāṃ
GK16visa07cu:3253_2: tatkampasambhavāt na śṛṅgāravyabhicāriṇoḥ sādhvasahāsayoreva vyañjanā syāt,
GK16visa07cu:3262: yathā--“kvākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulam-” ityādi /
GK16visa07cu:3268: viruddharasīyasyāpi tasya balavatā bādhyasya bādhyatvena kathanaṃ virodhino jaye yathātathā guṇaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3275: kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ pāsyatyanena vyaṅgyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3277: virādhino 'pi smaraṇo sāmyena vacane 'pi vā // VisSd_7.30 //
GK16visa07cu:3281: (vi, dha) virodhino 'pi iti---virodhirasasyāpi sañcāryyādeḥ smaraṇi smaryyamāṇatvena vyañjitasya vacane sāmyena vathane 'pi prakṛtarasena saha na virodho bhavet /
GK16visa07cu:3286: atrālambanavicchede raterarasātmatayā smaryamāṇānāṃ tadaṅgānāṃ śokoddīpakatayā kuṇānukūlatā /
GK16visa07cu:3302: nṛpā ruṣā bhejire prapedire priyatamayā iva /
GK16visa07cu:3307: strutaṃ kṣaritaṃ ghanaṃ gharmatoyaṃ rājñāṃ yataḥ,
GK16visa07cu:3309: strutaṃ niḥ sṛtaṃ ghanaṃ gharmatoyaṃ gātrāt yasyāstādṛśyā priyatamayā /
GK16visa07cu:3314: priyatamayā tu svīyakarāhatyā pṛthoḥ svorudeśarūpasya pīṭhasya dhvananam /
GK16visa07cu:3325_0: ekasasthāyibhāvo 'pi anyarase vyabhicāribhāva ityato raudrasasthāyibhāvaḥ krodho
GK16visa07cu:3326: nanu priyatamayā iva ityuktyā priyatamaiva sāmyena vivakṣitā,
GK16visa07cu:3336: “ekaṃ dhyānimīlanānmukulitaprāyaṃ dvitīyaṃ punaḥ pārvatyā vadanāmbujastanabhare sambhogabhāvālasam /
GK16visa07cu:3342: samādhisamaye vibhinnarasaṃ śambhoḥ netratrayaṃ vaḥ pātu /
GK16visa07cu:3352: dūre vikṛṣṭacāpo yo madanaḥ tadviṣaye krodhānalenoddīpitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3353: atra raudrarasasthāyibhāvasya krodhasya vācyatve 'pyuddīpanena tadanubhāvena punarvyañjanā aparāṅgatetyāha---atreti /
GK16visa07cu:3357: (lo, a) atra śānteti---aṅgino bhagavadviṣayaratibhāvasya aṅgabhāvena viruddhānāmapi śāntādīnāṃ nānyo 'nyavirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3360: “kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadānoṃ'śukāntaṃ gṛhṇan keśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa /
GK16visa07cu:3361: āliṅgan yo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhaiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:3364: (vi, bha) itthamaṅgini virodhināṃ sākṣādavirodhaṃ darśayitvā sākṣāt paramparābhyāṃ tādṛśānāmavirodhamāha---yathā vā---kṣipta iti /
GK16visa07cu:3365: tripurudāhe sa prasiddhaḥ śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnirvo duritaṃ dahatu /
GK16visa07cu:3366: kīdṛśaḥ hastāvalagnaḥ san sāśrunetrotpalābhistripurayuvatibhirārdraparādhaḥ kāmīva kṣiptaḥ evamaṃśukasyāntamādadāno 'pi abhihataḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3369: kāmipakṣe---cumbanārthaṃ keśagrahaṇaṃ tathā caraṇanipātato 'gniḥ sambhrameṇa bhayena nekṣitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3370: kāmī tu caraṇanipatitaḥ saṃbhrameṇādareṇa yat īkṣaṇaṃ tadviṣayo na kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3375: tasyāḥ paripoṣakatayā bhagavatastripuradhvaṃsaṃ pratyutsāhasyāparipuṣṭatayā rasapadavīmaprāptatayā bhāvamātrasya karuṇo 'ṅgam /
GK16visa07cu:3377: evaṃ cāviśrāntidhāmatayā karuṇasyāpyaṅgataiveti dvayorapi karuṇaśṛṅgārayorbhagavadutsāhaparipuṣṭatadviṣayaratibhāvāsvādaprakaṣrakatayā yaugapadyasambhāvādaṅgatvena na virodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3381: sa dahatu ityādi nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatvāt ṣa tasyāśceti /
GK16visa07cu:3387: sa cātra vyaṅgya ityato vīrarasa evātra pradhānam /
GK16visa07cu:3388: tat kathaṃ ratibhāvasya prādhānyamuktam ityata āha---tasya cāparipuṣṭatayā iti /
GK16visa07cu:3389: tasyotsāhasya sākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatvena dahatviti nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyakavibhāvāṅgatvenāprādhānyarūpayā aparipuṣṭatayā rasapadavīmanāptatayā bhāvamātrasya sthāyibhāvasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3396: itthaṃ bhagavadutsāhapuṣṭasya bhagavadviṣayakavibhāvasya sākṣātparamparābhyāmaṅgabhūtau karaṇaśṛṅgārau virodhisvarūpau api aviruddhau iti darśayati---evaṃ cāviśrāntīti /
GK16visa07cu:3399: bhagavadutsāhastu aṅgamapi bhāvasyāvirodhitvāt tadvirodho na darśitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3401: smaryyamāṇasya vibhāvādisāmyasya vivakṣādhīnavivakṣitasāmyasya aṅgirasena saha virodhaprasaktāvapi na virodhaityuktam,
GK16visa07cu:3410: tathā hi yāsāṃ tripurayuvatīnāṃ praṇayaroṣanivāraṇārthaṃ kāmī nirākṛtahastagrahaṇāni kṛtavān /
GK16visa07cu:3411: tāsveva niṣkaruṇāsu śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnistathā ceṣṭitavāniti sādṛśyasaṃdarśanāt smaryyamāṇenerṣyavipralambhena karuṇaḥ pratyuta puṣṭaṃ nītaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3414: nanu samūhālambanātmakapūrṇaghanānandarūpasya rasasya tādṛśenetararasena kathaṃ virodhaḥ sambhāvanīyaḥ ?
GK16visa07cu:3419_2: rasasya aṅgirasasya tādṛśena smaryamāṇena vivakṣitasāmyena vā rasena saha kathaṃ
GK16visa07cu:3423: tulyabalatvābhāvena pradhānabhūtena nirākāṅkṣavidheyavākyena vyaṅgyatayā pradhānena aṅhirasena balavatā smaryamāṇopamānayoreva upamardanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3424: na cāyaṃ sa rasanotkarṣotyādau nirākāṅkṣavākyaireva smaryamāṇaśṛṅgāra iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:3426: teṣāṃ vidheyapātityaṃ tu karuṇavyañjakameva śṛṅgārasya vyaṅgyatve 'pi parokṣatvādeva smaryamāṇatopacāra iti bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:3436: kṣipta ityādivākyānāṃ kāmīva ityādivākyasya canirākāṅkṣatvena tadvyaṅgyatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3457: ata evātra pradhānetareṣu raseṣu svātantryaviśrāmarāhityātpūrṇarasabhāvamātrācca vilakṣaṇatayā saṃcārirasanāmnā vyapadeśaḥ prācyānām /
GK16visa07cu:3462: ekavākyavyaṅgyatvābhāve 'pi dvayornirākaṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatve 'pi ca śṛṅgāravati karuṇāpratītyā virodhāprasaktirastyeva /
GK16visa07cu:3463: kintu smaryamāṇaśṛṅgārapekṣayā anubhūyamānasyopamānaśṛṅgārāpekṣayā upameyasya ca karuṇasya paryantikapratītiviṣayatayā prādhānyam /
GK16visa07cu:3464: evaṃ karuṇāpekṣayā bhagavati kavibhāvasya ca pāryantikapratītiviṣayatvena prādhānyam /
GK16visa07cu:3465_0: ityataḥ tādṛśapradhānetareṣu karuṇetaratra śṛṅgāre bhāvetaratra karuṇe ślokāntare
GK16visa07cu:3482: ekapadyabodhyatārūpāt saṃsargāt yadi rasāntare aṅgaprakarṣakaṃ syāttadā bādhya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3486: atathābhūtasya ca bādhyatvaṃ svaṇḍarasatvaṃ ca ityuktam /
GK16visa07cu:3488: (lo, u) yadyaṅgī rasaḥ aparipuṣṭatayā bhāvamātravailakṣaṇyenāpātatamātrataḥ prādhānyenābhivyaktaḥ samagraṃ nāsvādyata iti pastantratvāt,
GK16visa07cu:3495_0: (vi, śa) yatra tu kapole jānakyā ityatra vilodhinoḥ śṛṅgāravīrarasayornedṛśo bādhyabādhakabhāvastatra
GK16visa07cu:3495_1: tayoḥ kathaṃ sanniveśa ityāśaṅkya tu vīraśṛṅgārayorvirodhaṃ paroktaṃ darśayati---nanvādya iti /
GK16visa07cu:3497: ityuktanayena viruddhayoḥ kathamekatra vīraśṛṅgārayoḥ sanniveśa ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3503: muhuḥ paśyañchṛṇvan rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭgranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:3508: ślokārthastu raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ prabhuḥ rāmaḥ jānakyā vaktrakamalaṃ muhuḥ paśyan kharadūṣaṇādirajanicarasenākalakalaṃ śṛṇvān jaṭājūṭasya jaṭāsamūhasya granthiṃ draḍhayati /
GK16visa07cu:3509_0: vaktrakamalaṃ kīdṛśaṃ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi kapole smareṇajānakīniṣṭhena rāmaviṣayakasmareṇa
GK16visa07cu:3509_1: smeraḥ harṣaprāyaḥ sphārī vistṛtaḥ uḍḍāmaro bāhulyāt udbhaṭaḥ pulako yasya tādṛśaṃ
GK16visa07cu:3511: jaṭājuṭadraḍhanavyaṅgyo vīrarasaśca parasparamabādhyatam anaṅgatāṃ cāpannau svātantryeṇa upalabhyeti /
GK16visa07cu:3514: atrocyate---iha khalu rasānāṃ virodhitāyā avirodhitāyāśca tridhā vyavasthā /
GK16visa07cu:3531: tridhāpyālambanetyādinā kapole jānakyā ityādau bhinne ālambane vīrasya rajanīcarasenā,
GK16visa07cu:3534: evaṃ ca vīrasya nāyakaniṣṭhatvena bhayānakasya pratināyakaniṣṭhatvena nibandhe bhinānaśrayatvena na virodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3539: rajanīcarālambanakastu vīrarasa ityavirodha iti samādhāsyan āha---atrecyate /
GK16visa07cu:3542: tatra yasya yena saha vilodhastaṃ darśayati---tatra vīraśṛṅgārayoriti /
GK16visa07cu:3546: yathā mama---prauḍhāmādāya bhītiṃ manasi sarabhasaṃ prāpya lokāpakīrtiṃ naiva stokāpyapekṣākriyata pathi pathi prāktanāsu priyāsu /
GK16visa07cu:3547: śrīmanniḥ śaṅkabhānoḥ samaraparisaradbhīmmaniḥ sīmasenā- niḥ śāṇasvānaśaṅkākulamapasaratāṃ pañcagauḍeśvereṇa /
GK16visa07cu:3550: yaśca nāgānande praśamāśrayasyāpi jīmūtavāhanasya malayavatyanurāgo darśitaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:3551: tatra “aho gītamaho vāditram” ityadbhutasyāntarā niveśanānnairantaryābhāvānna śāntaśṛṅgārayorvirodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3555: (vi, ha) nanu śāntaśṛṅgārayornairantaryye virodhaścet kathaṃ nāgānande na tathā nibaddhamityata āha---yattviti /
GK16visa07cu:3559: (lo, ḷ) śāntaśṛṅgārayornairantaryyavirodhinorna paraṃ prabandhe yāvadekasminnapi vākye virādhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3561: saśoṇitaiḥ kavyabhujāṃ sphuradbhiḥ pakṣaiḥ khagānāmupavījyamānān saṃvījitāścandanavārisekaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ kalpalatādukūlaiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3562: vimānaparyyaṅkatale niṣaṇṇāḥ kutūhalāviṣṭatayā tadānīm nirddiśyamānān lalanāṅgulibhirvorāḥ svadehān patitānapaśyan /
GK16visa07cu:3566: “pāṇḍukṣāmaṃ vadanam-” ityādau ca pāṇḍutādīnāmaṅgabhāvaḥ karuṇavipralambhe 'pīti na virodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3569: (vi, ka) nanu paripanthirasāṅgasya vibhāvādeḥ parigraho doṣa ityuktam,
GK16visa07cu:3570: tatkatham “pāṇḍu kṣāmaṃ vadanaṃ hṛdayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3572: “ityādau śṛṅgārasīye mālatīmādhavīye śloke śṛṅgāraparipanthikaruṇānubhāvasya vadanapāṇḍutādeḥ sattve 'pi aduṣṭatānubhava ityata āha---pāṇḍu kṣāmam iti /
GK16visa07cu:3574: he sakhi / tava pāṇḍukṣāmavadanādikaṃ tava hṛdantaḥ kṣetriyarogam asmin kṣetre śarīre 'cikitsyaṃ rogamāvedayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3579: ubhayīyatve tu prakaraṇasācivyāt prakṛtasabodhāt na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3582: yadi khalu pāṇḍutvādīnāṃ vipralambhāpekṣayādhikā karuṇāṅgatā bhavet tadaiva doṣaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3585: anukāre ca sarveṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ naiva doṣatā // VisSd_7.31 //
GK16visa07cu:3597: adoṣatā ca guṇatā jñeyā cānubhayātmatā // VisSd_7.32 //
GK16visa07cu:3606: doṣatāguṇatayorvyātireko hi na doṣatā na guṇatā /
GK16visa07cu:3615: iti sāhityadarpaṇe doṣanirūpaṇo nāma saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ /
